GSP29vytrkt2u:2615: astu vā rūpamabhi 2 mataṃ tathāpi dīpādivatparaprakāśakaṃ syādeva prayojakasya 3 samatvāditi bhāvenāha -- kiñceti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:2616: nanu mahatve satyanabhibhūtodbhūtarūpavattejastvameva prayojakamataḥ suvarṇe tādṛśatejastvābhāvānna doṣa ityata āha-- yadi hīti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:2617: grīṣma ūṣmādyeva tādṛśaṃ teja ityata āha-- anabhivyañjakānāmiti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:2619: athāpi suvarṇaṃ tejaścedupeyate tarhi syādeva tatparaprakāśakaṃ tadrūpābhibhabhyāyuktādita bhāvena sparśapratibandīmāha- kiñceti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:2624: na caivaṃ sparśodbhave suvarṇamandhakāre tvacā gṛhyeta,

GSP29vytrkt2u:2628: tasmātvacā cakṣuṣā vā pītagurudravyādiriktasya 4 bhāgāntarasyāgrahe 5 ṇa dharmiṇa eva buddhyanārohānna tadrūpe 'bhibhavādikalpanaṃ yuktam//

GSP29vytrkt2u:2652: tathā ca tatra prāguktahetavo 'siddhā iti bhāvaḥ/

GSP29vytrkt2u:2687: 1.kvasya-rā.ka.ga.ja.naṃ.su. 2.'stha' iti nāsti-su. 3.taddrava-u. 4.na iti nāsti-u. 5.prāyaḥ 'vaddṛ' ityevāsti- u. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:2690: taijasaṃ ca pṛthivījanānyatve sati rūpavatvāditi dharmigrahakamānasiddhaṃ 1
GSP29vytrkt2u:2692: tanna / tvaduktaṃ rūpāparāvṛttirūpaṃ liṅgaṃ hi 2 rūpapāravṛtti pratibandhakakiñcidvatvenaivopapannaṃ 3 sanna pratibandhakasya dravatvaparyantaṃ
GSP29vytrkt2u:2695: pārthivasya svasaṃyuktopaṣṭambhakabhāge yo bhasmībhāvalakṣaṇo dāhastadavirodhitvādasya ca dravadravyasya tadvirodhitvādityarthaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt2u:2696: tarhi taddravyaṃ vāyvādirūpaṃ kuto netyata āha -- rūpavacceti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:2701: nanu -- tejontare naimittikadravatvavijātīyarūpe 4 pratibandhakatvayoradṛṣṭeratra kathaṃ tadadhikaraṇasya taijasatvakalpanamityata āha-- iti
GSP29vytrkt2u:2703: ādyānumāne hetoruktasādhyena vinānyathopapatyāprayojakatvena dharmigrāhakamānaṃ nirāha-- tvaduktamityādinā //
GSP29vytrkt2u:2704: nanu-- dravatvahīnamanyattādṛśapratibandhakaṃ vastu nāstyevetyata āha-- saṃbhavati ceti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:2705: kiṃ tadadṛṣṭaṃ cetakthaṃ ca pratibandhakatā kvāpyadṛṣṭerityato dṛṣṭāntapūrvaṃ vyanakti-- karaketi// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:2709: karakādau sāṃsiddhikadravatvasyevātyantānalasaṃyukte pārthive vajre pūrvarūpavijātīyarūpasyeva 1 suvarṇe 'pi vijātīyarūpasya bhojakādṛṣṭaviśeṣādeva
GSP29vytrkt2u:2710: anyathā karakādau dravatvapratibandhakaṃ kaṭhinaṃ bhāgāntaraṃ vajre 'pi rūpapaparāvṛttipratibandhakaṃ drutaṃ bhāgāntaraṃ kalpyaṃ syāt/
GSP29vytrkt2u:2711: tatra vajrādyatiriktaṃ bhāgantaramanupalabdhibādhitaṃ cedihāpi pītimāśrayātiriktaṃ drutamanupalabdhibādhitaṃ cedihāpi pītimāśrayātiriktaṃ drutamanupalabdhibādhitamiti
GSP29vytrkt2u:2717: nanvadṛṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭasāmagrīsaṃpattāvevopayuktamupalabdham na tu kiñcitkaramityata āha-- svīkṛtaṃ ceti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:2718: dravatvadvāraiva 3 dṛṣṭasya rūpaparāvṛttipratibandhakatā 4 na sākṣātkkathyamānajalāntarasthaghaṭādau tathaiva dṛṣṭeḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:2727: na tūpaṣṭa 1 bhyagataṃ dharmiṇā saha kalpyatvāvdyadhikaraṇatvācca /
GSP29vytrkt2u:2730: nanu -- pārthivadravatvasya svasamānādhikaraṇarūpaparāvṛttipratibandhakatve lā 5 kṣādidravatvamapi tathā syāditi cenna 6 /
GSP29vytrkt2u:2731: tvadabhimatadrutatejasaḥ svasaṃyukte pītadravye rūpaparāvṛttipratibandhakatve svasaṃyukte paṭādāvapi tathā syāditi 7 sāmyāt /

GSP29vytrkt2u:3299: iti vākyaśeṣaḥ svargapadasya su 4 khaviśeṣe śaktigrāhakaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:3314: śrutasyograṃ vaca iti śabdasyā“śanāyā pipāse ha vā ugraṃ vaca“ityādivivaraṇamaśanāpipāsayoḥ śaktigrāhakam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:3315: “sahakāratarau madhuraṃ rautipika“ityādau pikapadasya kokile sahakārādiprasiddhapadasamabhivyāhāraḥ śaktigrāhakaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt2u:3317: tathāpi tasyāpi tasya dharmamātropamānarūpamānarūpatvādupamānapadenaiva tasya grahaṇaṃ prāptamiti na pṛthaglakṣaṇasya grahaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt2u:3328: tacca nābhihitānvaya ityādi śabdā 2 anvitavācakāḥ ityantaḥ bhaktipādīyānuvyākhyānasudhayoruktam/ @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:3332: kiṃ ceśvarasaṅketarūpāyāḥ 1 svābhāvikasambandharūpāyā vā śakterabhāvena vṛtyantarāviṣaya 2 syānvayasya śābdadhīviṣayatvaṃ na syāt // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:3334: vyavahārādinā śabdaśaktimavadhārayatā puruṣeṇa śabdānāṃ śaktiścānvita eva syārthe 'nubhūyate /
GSP29vytrkt2u:3337: na kevalaṃ padānāṃ kintu prakṛtipratyayānāmapīti dyotanāya śabdānāmityuktiḥ//
GSP29vytrkt2u:3338: nanvanyalabhyepyanvayaśaktikalpana eva gauravamityato“na cāśakyābhidhāyitva“mityanuvyākhyānāṃśasya śabdānāmaśakyānvayabodhajanakatvaṃ na cetyarthamupetyāha -- kiñcetyādinā /
GSP29vytrkt2u:3347: vṛtyantarāviṣayatve sati śābdadhīvaṣayatvāt śaktiviṣayapadārthavat ityanumānaṃ ca
GSP29vytrkt2u:3358: kiṃ tu śabdasyāpi karaṇatvena cakṣurāderiva viṣayapratyāsannasyaiva kriyājanakatvena padārthenevānvayenāpi śaktirūpapratyāsatti 1 raṅgīkāryā/
GSP29vytrkt2u:3360: na ca cakṣuṣo rūpeṇa saṃyuktasamavāya iva śabdasyā 2 nvayena śakyapadārthasaṃbandha eva pratyāsattiriti vācyam/ @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:3362: janakatvaṃ ca karaṇatvāccakṣurādivaditi sāmānyator' 3 thena śabdasya saṃbandhasya siddhāvanyasyāyogācchaktireva pratyāsattiḥ sāmānyapariśeṣābhyāṃ sidhyatīti bhāvena--
GSP29vytrkt2u:3374: 1.riti vācyam-ityasti madhye lopaḥ-ga. riti vācyam-ca.ka. 3.'api' ityadhikam -su.rā. 3.tonvayena-naṃ. 4.syetyatra-naṃ.u. 5.toḥ śakyā-u.naṃ.
GSP29vytrkt2u:3378: anyathā cakṣuḥsaṃyuktakapālasamavete ghaṭe saṃyogaḥ patyāsattirna syāt//
GSP29vytrkt2u:3395: tathā ca gurutve prāguktadoṣo neti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:3396: na cākṣuṣa ityādinoktarthe doṣāntara 6 māha -- śakyeti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:3400: 1.api padaṃ nāsti-su.rā. 2.ghaṭapadaṃ nāsti-su.rā. 3.tvena gora-su.rā. tatpadaṃ nāsti-ga.ka. 4.ndhātpratī-su.rā. 5.thāsati-naṃ. 6.raṃ cāha-naṃ. 7.ṅgāpadātpratī-naṃ. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:3402: etena prathamaṃ gṛhītāpya 1 nvaye śaktiḥ kāryānvite śaktiriva 2 paścādbādhakātyajyatām /
GSP29vytrkt2u:3407: tatrendriyasannikarṣa evaindriyakatvamaryādāheturityasannikṛṣṭo vahnirnaindriyaka iti cettarhi śabdavṛttireva śābdatvamaryādāheturitivṛtyaviṣayonvayo na śābda iti samam // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:3409: svamate ca siddhārtha eva prathamaṃ vyutpatterupagamāt /
GSP29vytrkt2u:3414: prāguktamayuktamityāśāṅkya pratibandyā 4 nirāha-- na ca vṛttīti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:3422: kiṃ caivaṃ jātāveva śaktiḥ vyaktesttvakāṅkṣādivaśāddhīriti syāt //
GSP29vytrkt2u:3423: kiṃ ca ghaṭamityanena kriyāsāmānyānvitasvārthānabhidhāne sāmānyajñānasādhyā kriyāviśeṣa 1 jijñāsā na syāt //
GSP29vytrkt2u:3424: na ca jambīrādau rūpaviśeṣākṣipte 2 rasasāmānye 3 rasaviśeṣasyeva ghaṭa 4 niṣṭhakarmatvākṣipte kriyāsāmānye tadviśeṣe 5 sya jijñasā yukteti 6 vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:3426: anvayasyānvayalabhyatve vyakterapi tathātvavāpatyā śabdaśakyatā na syādityāha-- kiṃ ceti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:3427: vivahiṣyate caitat ṣaṭkā 8 ntargatavyaktipratibandī na yuktetyādinā/
GSP29vytrkt2u:3428: kriyāviśeṣajijñāsānyathānupapattiṃ cānvite śaktau māna 9 mityāha-- kiñceti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:3431: sāmānyānvayasya śabdaśaktyaviṣayatve 'pi tajjñānasaṃbhavādviśeṣajijñāsā yukteti bhāvena dṛṣṭaphalādau rasaviśeṣa 11 jijñāsāvadityādinā maṇyuktamāśaṅkyāha -- na cetyādinā //
GSP29vytrkt2u:3438: kiṃ ca tvāyāpi ghaṭamiti dvitīyā 2 vibhaktyarthakarmatvānvitasyaiva prātipadikārthasya
GSP29vytrkt2u:3439: kriyānvaye pratiyogitā khaṇḍavākyārthabhūtasyānvitasya ca mahāvākyār 3 thabhūtānvaye pratiyogitā vācyā /
GSP29vytrkt2u:3442: ekatrarānvite śakteḥ kḷptatvātsarvatrāpi tathetyaha -- kiṃ ceti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:3457: tathātve vā śaktiviṣayatvaṃ kuta ityata āha-- vṛttīti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:3459: 1.apipadaṃ nāsti-su.rā. 2.yavi-su.rā. 3.bhūta ityārabhya etatparyantaṃ nāsti-su.rā. 4.gi- su.rā. 5.anubhūta-naṃ. 6.kriyānvaya iti ityārabhya nāsti -u.naṃ. 7.padārthāntareṇetyādi,
GSP29vytrkt2u:3463: khaṇḍavākyārtharūpe 'nvite ca na lakṣaṇetyanvite śaktiḥ kḷptetyanyatrā 1 nvite śaktisiddhiḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:3467: 2 kadaiva mahāvākyasthān sarvān padārthānvitatayā bodhayatīti vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:3469: tathātve hi dinedine śrutena śāstrarūpamahāvākyaikadeśarūpakhaṇḍavākyena tattadarthabodhodayo na syāt /
GSP29vytrkt2u:3474: anvaye śaktiṃ vinaiva mahāvākyārthabodhaprakāramāśaṅkya nirāha-- na ceti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:3478: ekasminneva dine sarvaśāsttaśravaṇāyogena pratyahaṃ yāvadavadhāraṇaṃ 6 śakyaṃ tāvata
GSP29vytrkt2u:3481: māghe caturthe sarge --“utkāraṃ dāruka ityuvāce“tyatratyasya“ityuvāce“tyasya āsargasamāpti pratiślokamanvayena tattacchalokārthaviṣakriyānvayabodhaśca na syādityarthaḥ// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:3484: pratijñāvākyena viśiṣṭasvārthabodhane kuta ityākāṅkṣānudayena hetuvākyasyānvayaśca 1 na syāt//
GSP29vytrkt2u:3506: nanvanvitābhidhāne ghaṭamānayatītyādau kārakapade 1 nānvayapratiyogitayā kriyāyāḥ kriyāpadenāpi tatpratiyogitā
GSP29vytrkt2u:3508: kārakapade kriyānvitakārakatvasya kriyāpade ca 3 kārakānvitakriyātvasya pravṛttinimittasya bhedena putrapitṛśabdayorivāparyāyatvāt/ @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:3510: evaṃ sādhakhānyuktvānvitābhidhānaṃ bādhakā 4 nyāpyāśaṅkya nirāha-- nanvityādinā //
GSP29vytrkt2u:3513: syādayaṃ doṣo 6 yadi ghaṭaḥ karīra ityādāvivi padapravṛttinimittaikyaṃ 7 bhavet/
GSP29vytrkt2u:3516: putrādiśabdasya saṃbandhiśabdatvena pitrādyupasthāpakatve 'pi putratvādinimittabhedādyathā na paryāyatvaṃ tathetyarthaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt2u:3517: nanu kriyātvakārakatvādeḥ parasparāvinābhāvāttadvācinorapi paryāyatvamityāha āha-- na hīti // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:3518: 1.nāpyanvaya-rā.su.ga. 3.'na' iti nāsti -su.rā.naṃ. 3.'ca' iti nāsti-su.rā. 4.nyāśa-naṃ.u. 5.ntyā-naṃ.u. dhānamāha-e. 6.yadi iti nāsti-naṃ.u.e. 7.kyebha-e. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:3520: na hi pravṛttinimittayorbhede 'pi tayossam 1 niyatatāmātreṇa paryayatvam //

GSP29vytrkt2u:3527: kārakānvitā 4 kriyā kriyānvitaṃ kārakamiti kriyākārakayor 5 bhānārthaṃ padadvayamarthavadityata āha-- viśeṣaṇeti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:3531: viśeṣānvayapratipatya 7 ṅgatayopayogācceti dṛṣṭāntoktipūrvaka 8 māha -- mīmāṃsakamata iti//
