GSP29vytrkt2u:3539: iti iṣṭā-e. r8.vamā-naṃ. 9.evakāro nāsti-naṃ.u.e. 10. syānanvaye sahitayo-naṃ.e.
GSP29vytrkt2u:3547: evaṃ ghaṭapadena ghaṭarūpe kārakaviśeṣe 'bhihite kriyāpadena tadanvitakriyābhidhānamityanyonyāśraya iti vācyam / @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:3549: yaścārthādartho na sa codanārtha“iti nyāyāditi sudhoktameva vyañjayannāha -- prayojaneti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:3553: yāvatpūrvapadaṃ svārthaṃ nābhidhatte tāvaduttarapadasya pūrvapadārthānvitasyārthābhidhānaṃ nāsti/
GSP29vytrkt2u:3559: 1.ntaropi tatta-su.rā. ntare ca -ka. 2.mīmāṃsaketyārabhya nāsti-naṃ.ja. 3.ke ca -su.rā.naṃ. kyepi-ka. 4.śādārthi-su.rā. 5.sāmagrīti ityadhikam-e. 6.nyāpe-naṃ. nyārthābhidhānā-u. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:3562: manmate padānāṃ pratyekameva yogyetarasāmānyānvitasvārthābhidhāne sāmarthyena padā
GSP29vytrkt2u:3565: na caivamapi kārakapadajanyā kriyāsāmānyānvitarūpaviśiṣṭadhīḥ kriyāsāmānyānvayarūpaviśeṣaṇadhīsādhyā iha 6 taddhīheturanyo nāstīti - @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:3588: evaṃ kriyāpadajanyā kārakasāmānyānvitarūpaviśiṣṭadhīrapi kārakasāmānyānvayarūpaviśeṣaṇadhīsādhyā taddhīśca kārakapadenaiveti punarapyanyonyāśraya iti vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:3605: yanna duḥkhena saṃbhinnaṃ na ca grastamanantaram /
GSP29vytrkt2u:3613: ghaṭādipadairiva ca viśeṣaṇopasthitiṃ vinai kārakādipadaiḥ kriyāsāmānyādyanvitābhidhānānubhavāt//
GSP29vytrkt2u:3619: tatra hi viśeṣaṇopasthāpaka 5 padāntarasyābhāvātpadasmāritasyaiva padārthai'nvayapratiyogitvāttatra viśeṣopasthiterabhāve 'pi yathā viśiṣṭa 6 bodhastathehāpītyarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:3622: “sāmānyānvite śaktāvupetāyāṃ viśeṣānvayabodhāyoga 8 ityato viśeṣānvayapratipatyarthaṃ ca padāntarasamabhivyāhāropayoga“iti sudhoktamāha-- anvayaviśeṣeti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:3630: saṅgatigrahaṇakāle sāmānyānvite śa 1 ktergṛhītatvena govyakti 2 vatvanmate jātyākṛtiviśiṣṭagovyaktivacca
GSP29vytrkt2u:3633: anyathā jātāveva śaktirvyakte 4 stvākāṅkṣā 5 divaśāddhīriti syāt/
GSP29vytrkt2u:3634: pratyuta padāntarārthe kriyāviśeṣe ākāṅkṣārthameva kārakapadasya kriyāsāmānyānvite śaktirāvaśyakī/
GSP29vytrkt2u:3635: ata eva viśeṣānvaye śaktyabhāvāttasya śābdatvaṃ na syāditi nirastam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:3648: etadapi pūrvabhaṅga eva“kiñca ghaṭamityanene“ityādinopapāditamiti bhāvaḥ/ ata eveti// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:3652: etadevābhipretyoktaṃ paddhatau“pratyekaṃ sāmānyato yogyetarānvitasvārthābhidhānaśaktī 3 ni padāni padāntarasannidhānāhitaśaktyantarāṇi viśeṣato 'pyanvitān svārthānabhidadhatī“ti/
GSP29vytrkt2u:3656: padāntarasamabhivyāhāro hi sāmānyasya viśeṣaparyavasāna eva hetuḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:3663: yadyapi sudhāyāṃ jijñāsādhikaraṇe“śaktiścaivānvita“iti ślokavyākhyāvasare padānāmautsargikī sāmānyānvaye śaktiḥ,
GSP29vytrkt2u:3673: 1 kecittu--“na punaravidyamānaśaktyā 2 dhāna“iti sudhaiva padāntara 3 samabhivyāhārātpūrvamanvayasāmānye 4 śaktirnetyetanniṣedhapareti na virodha
GSP29vytrkt2u:3674: nanvevamapyānayanānvito ghaṭo ghaṭānvitamānayanamityanvayarūpasya viśeṣyarūpasyārthasya ca bhedena tadbhedanibandhano vākyabhedaḥ syāditi ce 5 nna/
GSP29vytrkt2u:3675: 6 tathāpi caitro ghaṭamānayatītyatra ghaṭaprātipadikasya jātyādiviśiṣṭavyaktivācitvājjātyākṛtyanvito ghaṭaḥ prakṛtipratyayārthayoḥ pūrvamanvayādghaṭānvitaṃ
GSP29vytrkt2u:3678: kṛtyanvitaścaitra ityanvayarūpa viśeṣyarūpasya cārthasya bhedena vākyabhedaḥ syāt // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:3696: śakyaḥ, tava tvaśaktyo 1 'pi māhāvākyārtha 2 bhūtānvayavatsahakārivaśācchābda iti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:3699: nanu nyāyamate anvayasyāśakyatvādvākyabhedo na doṣestava tu śa 5 kyatvāddoṣa ityata etadvaiṣamyamaprayojakam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:3705: kārakānvitā kriyā kriyānvitaṃ ca kārakamiti dhīprasaṅgeta vākyabhedaḥ syāditi śaśadharoktaṃ ca pratyuktam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:3707: kriyānvito ghaṭo ghaṭānvitā kriyeti bodhasya sarvasākṣitvenādoṣāpatteriti// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:3711: nanvanvitasya ghaṭasya ghaṭapadārthatve ghaṭamānayetyukte 'nvitasyaiva ghaṭasya punarānayanādyanvayadhīḥ syāditi cenna/
GSP29vytrkt2u:3712: tava jātyākṛtibhyāmiva mama yogyena 1 karmatvādinā dharmeṇānvitasyaiva ghaṭasyānayanādyanvayapratītā 2 viṣṭāpatteḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:3713: ghaṭaprātipadikārthasya pratyayārthībhūtakarmatvānvayātpūrvaṃ kriyāsāmānyānvayayogyatve pūrvaṃ kriyāsāmānyānvayadhī 3 riṣṭaiva,
GSP29vytrkt2u:3714: ayogyatve tu tata eva na pūrva 4 mānvayadhīḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:3715: anvayāṃśe anayanādya 5 nanvayastu tava jātyākṛtyaṃśa iva ekapadopāttatve 6 na prathamānvitakarmatvāṃśa iva cākāṅkṣādyabhāvādyuktaḥ// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:3723: nanvanvitānvaya 8 ityasya lambakarṇamānayetyādāviva viśeṣaṇībhūtānvayarūpaviśeṣaṇe 9 pyānayanānvayaḥ syādityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:3725: viśiṣṭasya ca padārthatvādityata āha-- anvayāṃśa iti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:3726: yathā jātyākṛtiviśiṣṭavyaktirūpe padārthe ānayanādikriyānvaye 'pi na jātyādyaṃśe tadanvayaḥ,
GSP29vytrkt2u:3732: nanu nathāpi ghaṭapadajanite janaka jñāne ānayanānvito ghaṭa iti ghaṭaṃ pratyupasarjanatayā
GSP29vytrkt2u:3733: bhātasyānayanasya kathaṃ janyajñāne ghaṭakarmakānayanamiti prādhānyena ghaṭaṃ prati bhānam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:3735: mama tu ghaṭaḥ karmatvamānayanaṃ kṛtiriti janakajñāne 'pi ghaṭasyānayanaṃ prati prādhānyenābhānānna viparivṛttiriti cenna/ @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:3737: ānayanānvi 3 to ghaṭa iti jñāne satyeva ghaṭānvitamānayanamiti jñānaṃ 4 (ghaṭa)
GSP29vytrkt2u:3740: tatra ca pūrvajñāna janakamuttarajñānaṃ janyamityapi vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:3742: evaṃ ca janakajñāne 'nvayapratiyogitayā viśeṣaṇatvena bhādamānayanaṃ ghaṭaśca viśeṣyatvena
GSP29vytrkt2u:3743: bhātaḥ tatkathamuttarajñāne ghaṭo 'nvayapratiyogitayā viśeṣaṇatvenānayanaṃ viśeṣyatvena bhāyādityarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:3747: guṇapradhānaviparivṛttau janyajanakabhāvo netyetatparāmarśavādānte maṇyuktarītyā vyabhicārītyāha -- puruṣasyeti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:3754: puruṣasya daṇḍa iti jñānasya viśeṣaṇajñānatayā janakatve 'pi tajjanye daṇḍī puruṣa iti jñāne 'pi viparivṛttidarśanāt//
GSP29vytrkt2u:3755: nanu jñānasya yadviṣayatvena janakatvaṃ tanmadhye yadyasya viśeṣaṇaṃ 1 tattatra phalībhūte jñāne tasya viśeṣyaṃ neti niyamaḥ,
GSP29vytrkt2u:3756: puruṣasya daṇḍa iti jñānaṃ 2 ca na puruṣaviṣayatayā janakaṃ,
GSP29vytrkt2u:3758: tatra ca daṇḍaṃ prati daṇḍatvaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ,
GSP29vytrkt2u:3760: bhūtale ghaṭābhāva iti jñānena ghaṭābhāvavadbhūtalamiti jñānadarśanāt/ @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:3763: daṇḍītyatra puruṣaṃ prati daṇḍasya viśeṣaṇatve 'pi da 4 ṇḍāpekṣayā daṇḍatvasya viśeṣaṇatvā 5 napāyāditi bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:3774: parvate vahnivyāpyo 1 dhūma iti parāmarśenāpi parvato vahnimānityanumitidarśanācca // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:3779: bhūtale ghaṭābhāvajñānaṃ janakaṃ tacca bhūtalaghaṭābhāvobhayaviṣayakatvenaivābhāvavadbhūtalamiti jñāne heturiti vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:3781: evaṃ ca janakajñānasya yadviṣayatvena hetutvaṃ tanmadhye eva viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyatayā
GSP29vytrkt2u:3788: parokṣādāviva sarvatropapattau guṇapradhānabhāvaviparivṛttau na janyajanakabhāva iti niyamagrāhakapramāṇābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:3789: ata eva śābdabodha evāyaṃ niyama ityapi pratyuktam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:3792: janakajñāne viśeṣaṇatvena bhātasyāpi parvatasya janyānumitau viśeṣyatvadarśanena parokṣajñāne 'yaṃ niyama ityapi netyarthaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt2u:3825: kiṃ tu sā svarūpasatyeva hetuḥ, na tu jñātā/
GSP29vytrkt2u:3828: anvayasya padārthanirūpyatvena nāgṛhītaviśeṣaṇānyāyena tatraiva śaktigrahasya hututvāt/
GSP29vytrkt2u:3834: kuta ityato 'yato 2 labhyatvānna tatra jñātopayujyata ityāha -- padārtha iti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:3838: “nāgṛhītaviśeṣaṇā viśeṣya buddharutpadyate“iti nyāyena prathamopasthitapadārtharūpaviśeṣaṇāṃśa eva śaktigrahasya hetutvādityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:3843: śaktigrahe 'pi gauravānyalabhyatvābhyāmanvayāṃśamapahāya padārthamātraviṣayatvenaiva śaktigrahasya śābdabodha 1 hetutvakalpanāt//
GSP29vytrkt2u:3844: na caivaṃ padarthe jñātā śaktirupayoginyanvaye tvajñāteti śaktidvitve gauravamiti vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:3845: gurumate jātiviśiṣṭavyaktiviṣayāyāḥ śakterekatve 'pi jātyaṃśamātre jñātopayogitvavadihāpyanvitaviśaṣayāyāḥ śakterekatve 'pi padārthāṃśamātre
GSP29vytrkt2u:3849: asminnapi pakṣe 'nvite prāthamikī vyutpattirityādi siddhāntasādhakaṃ yuktiṣaṭkaṃ susthirameva // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:3850: nanūbhayatra śakterekatve jñātatvājñātatvayorvirodhena śaktibhede gauravamiti śaṅkate -- na ceti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:3851: śaktyaikye 'pyavacchedaka bhedādāvirodha iti sadṛṣṭāntamāha-- guramata 3 iti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:3862: prāganvite śaktirityatroktasādhakaṣaṭkamevānvaye 'pi śaktigraho heturiti pakṣe 'pi samānamityarthaḥ// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:3863: 1.dhehe-- su.rā. 2.cet ityadhikam-rā.su. 'ucyate' iti paryantaṃ nāsti-su.rā. 3.tamiti-naṃ.e. 4.saṃjñā ityadhikam-e. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:3865: na cānvaye śakteḥ satvamātreṇa tasya śābdatvaṃ tasyāḥ pratyāsattitvaṃ ca yuktamiti vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:3868: kiṃ ca dhūmostīti 1 vākye dhūmaśaśabdasya vahnau lakṣaṇārūpavṛttijñāne satyeva śābdadhīranyathānumitirityanvayāṃśe vatyajñāne kathamanvayasya śābdatvam // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:3870: yacca śabdarūpakaraṇasyānvayāṃśe pratyāsannatvaṃ syādityuktaṃ taddvayamapyanvayāṃśe śaktigrahasya na hetutvasādhakaṃ,
GSP29vytrkt2u:3871: anyathaiva tatsiddherite śaṅkate-- na cānvaya iti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:3873: svarūpasatyā eva śakteḥ śābdadhīhetutve pratyāsattitve ca
GSP29vytrkt2u:3878: sa tu gāvyādyasādhuśabdaśaktigrahe pramāyā api dṛṣṭestadabhiprāyaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:3882: yuktiṃ ca catuṣṭayamadhikaṃ vivakṣuḥ anyatra kḷptatvācchaktisthale 'pi tajjñāna 7
GSP29vytrkt2u:3888: 8 parokṣānumānasthale janyajñānaviṣayasaṃbandhasya janakajñānepi viṣayatvaniyamāditi yuktyantaramāha -- api ceti// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:3894: api ca 1 parokṣajñāne phalībhūtajñānaviṣayasya saṃbandhasya janakībhūtajñānaviṣayatvaniyameva śābdaphalībhūtajñānaviṣayasyānvayasya tajja 2
GSP29vytrkt2u:3895: bhavati hi pakṣataditarasādhāraṇyena pravṛttasya vahnidhūmasāmānādhikaraṇyaviśeṣarūpavyāptijñānasya parvatavahnisaṃbandho ''ṣi sāmānyena viṣayaḥ
GSP29vytrkt2u:3896: kiṃ ca yadyanvayāṃśe śaktijñānaṃ na hetustarhi ghaṭamānayatītyādipadajātādiva,
GSP29vytrkt2u:3898: padasya padārthe śaktestatsmṛtestatsādhyāyā ananvitapadārthasmṛteḥ padārtheṣu yogyatādeśca satvāt// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:3905: ghaṭaḥ karmatvamityādāvanyayāpratītirapyanvayāṃśe 'pi śaktijñānasya hetutve mānamityāha-- kiṃ ca yadīti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:3914: 1 na ca tādṛśaṃ padajātaṃ śilāśakalamaṅkura iva kriyākārakabhāvenānvayabodhe svarūpāyogyaṃ,
GSP29vytrkt2u:3916: evaṃ hi ghaṭaḥ karmatvamityādivākyaṃ śrutavato 'bhijñasya nāma vibhaktidhātvākhyātasmaraṇādutpannānvayabodhasya
GSP29vytrkt2u:3917: prayojyavṛddhasya vyavahāraṃ paśyato bālasya ghaṭaḥ karmatvamityādāveva vyutpannasya
GSP29vytrkt2u:3946: anyaṃ tu prati tadrahitatvānnetyanvayāṃśe śaktijñāna 1 sahakāritā siddhā//
GSP29vytrkt2u:3947: kiṃ ca padārthāṃśe śaktijñānamapi padārthasmṛtidvārā śakti 2 dhīheturiti te matam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:3948: na ca tatsmṛtau śaktirūpasaṃbandhasya śaktitvena jñānamapekṣitaṃ,
GSP29vytrkt2u:3949: tadabhāve 'pi hastirūpasaṃbandhidarśanajanyaṃ hastipakasmaraṇaṃ prati saṃbandhāṃśe jñānasya saṃbandhatvaprakārakasyaiva hetutvadarśanāt /
GSP29vytrkt2u:3955: tataśca kiṃ prakṛta ityata āha-- bālaṃ pratīti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:3956: śaktitvena śaktijñānasyā 5 nanyathāsiddhatvaṃ cānvayadhīhetutve mānāmityāhu -- kiṃ ceti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:3959: astvevaṃ tataḥ kimityata āha-- evaṃ ceti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:3966: atha saṃbandhatvaprakārakajñānenaivākāśasya smaraṇe siddhe 'nubhavārthaṃ śaktitvena jñānamapekṣyata 1 iti cettarhyanvayānubhavārthaṃ tatraiva śaktijñānāpekṣeti madiṣṭasiddhiḥ//
GSP29vytrkt2u:3967: evaṃ cānvitābhidhāne na kevalaṃ pūrvoktaṃ ṣaṭkam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:3969: parokṣajñāne phalībhūtajñānaviṣayasya saṃbandhasya janakībhūtajñānaviṣayatvaniyamo ghaṭaḥ karmatvamityādāvanvayāpratītiḥ,
GSP29vytrkt2u:3972: śaktitvena śaktijñānarūpakāraṇaṃ vinā 2 nyasya padārthasmṛtyādirūpakāraṇasya sarvasya satvāditi bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:3976: anubhavār 4 thakatvapakṣe kevalapadārthe tadayogenānvayasahita evānubhavasya vācyatvena tadarthamevānvaye śaktijñānamapekṣitamityuktaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:3991: anvaye tu svarūpasatīti kubjaśaktipakṣe sādhakaṣṭakaṃ sthirameveti tatrānvayasya śābdatvaṃ kāraṇarūpaśabdasya
GSP29vytrkt2u:3992: pratyāsannatvaṃ ca śaktijñānaṃ vinā na yuktamiti sādhakadvayasyopapādane 'pi śaktirjātāviva
GSP29vytrkt2u:3993: vyaktāvapi tadviśiṣṭavyaktibodhe jñātopayujyate na tu vyaktyaṃśe ajñāteti yathocyate
GSP29vytrkt2u:3995: yena jātivyaktipratibandyānvayāṃśe 'pi śaktirjñātopayuktā śābdabodhe syāditi bhāvena śaṅkate -- nanviti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4002: nanu gotve gaupadaṃ śaktamiti jñātaṃ prati viṣatayā jāteravacchedakatvaṃ nāgṛhītaviśeṣaṇānyāyena viśeṣaṇībhūtavyaktimādāyaiva yuktam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4004: - śaktistajjñānasya jitiviśiṣṭavyaktijñāna 2 hetutve vyaktyaṃśe śakteḥ svarūpasatyā eva hetutve gauravamityanvayaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4006: ga 3 vādiśabdena gotvādijñāne janayitavye jātergopadaśakyatvena jñānatatvaṃ yathā
GSP29vytrkt2u:4007: prayojakaṃ tathā govyaktijñāne janayitavye 'pa gopadaśakyatvena jñānatatvasyaiva
GSP29vytrkt2u:4017: ata eva jñāne vyāvartakāparaparyāyamavacchedakaṃ jātau ca govyakti 4 rviśeṣaṇam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4025: anyatra niyamena pratītestu nityādipadanyajñāne gotvapratītāvapi gavādi 1 vyakterapratītyā vyaktāvapyasatvāt/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4027: tathā ca nāgṛhītaviśeṣaṇā viśeṣye buddhirita nyāyena gotve gopadaṃ śaktamiti jñānaṃ
GSP29vytrkt2u:4028: govyaktiṃ gotvaṃ ca viṣayīkarotīti tādṛśajñānaṃ prati jātivyaktyordvayorapi viṣayatayāvacchedakatvaṃ
GSP29vytrkt2u:4029: nyāyyamiti jātyaṃśa iva vyaktyaṃśe 'pi śaktijñānaṃ jātiviśiṣṭvyaktijñāne heturiti yuktam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:4034: tādṛśajñāne ca padārthasyevānvayasyāpi niyamenopasthityā taṃ vinā padārthopasthiterityasyāsiddhiritibhāvaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4039: api ca yaddharmavattayā jñāta eva yatra yasya jñānaṃ sa tatrāvacchedaka ityādimaṇyuktaṃ hṛdi kṛtvā vaiṣamyāntaramanūdya nirāha -- eteneti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4044: etena jātivyaktyossamānasaṃvitsaṃvedyatayā vyaktijñānatvena jñāta eva jātijñāne śaktigrahādvyakterapyavacchedaka 1 tayā śakyatvaṃ,
GSP29vytrkt2u:4062: tathāca vyaktijñānatve 7 na jñāna eva jātijñāna ityayuktamiti bhāvaḥ// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:4067: na ca jātiviśiṣṭavyaktau śaktyabhāve tayorvi 1 śiṣṭā dhīrna syāditi vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4068: tvanmate padārthayoriva jātivyaktyorapi prathamaṃ padādananvitayorevopasthitāvapi paścādākāṅkṣādisahakāreṇa vaiśiṣṭyarūpānvayadhīsaṃbhavāt//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4069: na caikapadopasthāpya 2 yoḥ parasparamanvayoḥ na vyutpanna iti vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4070: jīrṇanaiyāyikamate eka liṅpratyayopāttayorapi kṛtīṣṭasādhanatvayoḥ sarveṣāṃ mate ekalaṭpratyayopāttayoḥ kṛtivartamānatvayoranvayadhīdarśanāt//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4071: nanu -- jātaveva śaktiritipakṣe jātiviśiṣṭavyaktibuddhyanupapatyā tatra viśiṣṭe śaktirastu/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4074: jātiviśiṣṭavyaktibuddherapi tathaivānyalabhyatvātanna viśiṣṭe śaktirastvityāha-- tvanmata iti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4077: vākye padadvayopasthāpyapadārthayostathānvayabodhayoge 'pi na jātivyaktyorekaśabdopasthāpyatvāditi śaṅkate -- na ceti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:4082: na ca vyakeranya 1 labhyatvasaṃbhave 'pi vibhaktyarthībhūtasaṅkhyākarmatvādyanvayārthaṃ vyakteḥ padārthatvamupeyam,
GSP29vytrkt2u:4084: anvayasya śabdavṛtyaviṣayatve 'pi śābdatvavadvyakterapi prakṛtivṛtyaviṣayatve 'pi prakṛtyarthatvasya saṃbhavena vibhaktarthānvayopapatteḥ//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4085: anyathā daṇḍinamānayetyādau daṇḍiśabdapratipādye daṇḍaviśiṣṭapuruṣe karmatvādyanvayo na syāt/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4087: nanu jñātakaraṇe saṃbandho yāvatpratiyogikatvena jñāta eva jñātahetuḥ,
GSP29vytrkt2u:4090: nanu vyakteraśabdārthatve śabdārthabhūtaikatvā 3 disaṃkhyādyanvayo na syādatastatra śakttayaivopasthitirapekṣitetyāśaṅkate -- na ceti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4111: anyatheti// prakārantareṇa yatkiñcitpratiyogikatvena jñāta iti kalpana ityarthaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4123: 1.tat iti nāsti- naṃ.su.ga. tatkalpyamanvayāṃ -ja.ka. 2.vṛtti-naṃ. vibhakti- ja. 3.ktyatve -naṃ.e. 4.jñā-e.
GSP29vytrkt2u:4126: nanu tathāpi jñātakaraṇe saṃbandhaḥ saṃsargipratiyogikatayaiva jñāto hetuḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4130: evaṃ ca śaktiḥ saṃsargībhūtapadārthapratiyogikatayaiva jñātā hetuḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4134: prakārāntareṇānvayāṃśe śaktijñānaṃ na śābdadhīheturityā 2 kṣipya samādhatte-- nanu tathāpīti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4137: tataḥ kimityata pakṣe yojayati-- evaṃ ceti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4144: jātivyāptyorubhayorapi saṃsargikayobhayāṃśe jñātā śabdaśaktiḥ jitiviśiṣṭavyaktijñānahetuścedapi na tatra vyabhicāra iti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4152: anvitaviṣakavyavahārarūpeṇa śaktigrāhakamānena tvanvayenāpi saha śaktigraha iti vaiṣamyāt//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4153: anyathā saṃsargeṇa saha vyāptiḥ svarūpeṇaiva nāstīti anvayepi śaktiḥ svarūpeṇaiva na syāt/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4154: vyāptirvyāpakatāvacchedaka 1 pratiyogikatayāpi na jñāyata iti śaktirapi śakyatāvacchedakajātipratiyigikatayāpi na jñātavyā,
GSP29vytrkt2u:4156: saṃsargapratiyogikatayā vyāptigrāhakamānābhāvādeva tena rūpeṇā 2 jñātāyā api tasyā
GSP29vytrkt2u:4157: anumitihetutvepīha śaktau saṃsargipratiyogikatayāpi prāguktadiśā grāhakamāna 3 bhāvena
GSP29vytrkt2u:4162: nanu tatrāpi yatra dhūmastatra vahnisaṃsarga ityastyeva vyāptīriti vadantaṃ prati vyāptiśarīrapraviṣṭasambandhena vyāptyabhāvarūpadoṣe satyapi jātipratibandīmapyāha -- vyāptiriti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4165: tathā ca padaśaktivādasiddhānte jātivyaktyubhayapratiyogikatayā jñātaiva heturiti tvadupapādanavirodha iti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4166: anvayapratiyogikatayāpi śakterjñānasya śābdadhīhetutve bādhakāntaramāśaṅkya nirāha -- na ceti// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:4169: na cānvayasyāpi prāgupasthitau padārthasyevānyasyāpi saṃsargaḥ śābdabodhe bhāseteti vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4171: na ca tvanmate 'vyayaṃ niyamaḥ yaḥ kāraṇībhūtadhīviṣayaḥ tatsaṃsargaḥ kāryabhūtajñāne
GSP29vytrkt2u:4174: ubhayapratiyogikatayā śaktervyutpattidaśāyāṃ grahaṇe sati śābdabodhātpūrvaṃ śaktismṛtidaśāyāmapyubhayapratiyogika
GSP29vytrkt2u:4176: 2 padātpadārthasya prāgupasthityā śābdabodhe tannirūpitasaṃsargavatprāgupasthiteḥ kāraṇatayā tajjanyajñāne kāraṇībhūtajñānaviṣayanirūpitasaṃsargasyāpi
GSP29vytrkt2u:4177: tathā cānayanānvayavān ghaṭa iti dhīprasaṅga iti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4180: yadviṣaye śaktijñānaṃ tadviṣaya eva jñānajanakatvaṃ śabdasya svabhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4181: śaktijñānaṃ ca padārthe 3 tadanvaye ca prāgāsīdīti tayoreva śābdabodhe bhānaṃ,
GSP29vytrkt2u:4184: nyāyamate jñānayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāva eva pūrvajñānaviṣayasaṃsargabhāne hetuḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4186: daṇḍajñānajye daṇḍīti viśiṣṭajñāne ca darśanāccetyata āha-- na ca tvanmate 'pīti // ayamiti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4191: viśeṣaṇajñānatayā hetubhūtāyā dhārāvāhikaprathamādibuddherviṣayo yaḥ saṃsargaḥ tatpratiyogisaṃsargasya dvitīyādibuddhāvabhānāt//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4196: hetubhūtasya padārthajñānasya viṣa 1 yo jātivyaktyorvaiśiṣṭyarūpo yaḥ saṃbandhaḥ tatsaṃsargasya śābdapramāyāmabhānāt// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:4201: ayaṃ ghaṭa ityādidhārāvāhikasthale ghaṭapaṭatva 3 saṃsarga ityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4212: anyathā parvato vahnisaṃyogavānityeva dhīḥ syānna tu vahnimānitīti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4216: etena yathā pratyakṣe viśiṣṭajñāne viśeṣyendriyasannikarṣo viśeṣyabhā 1 nasāmagrī,
GSP29vytrkt2u:4219: taditarā tu dhīrviśeṣaṇabhā 4 nasāmagrī 5 ti sāmagrīdvayasanniviṣṭādasaṃsargāgrahādeva saṃsargabhāna,
GSP29vytrkt2u:4224: nirvikalpakādirūpaṃ ghaṭatvādiviśeṣaṇajñānaṃ tu ghaṭatvādiviśeṣaṇabhānasāmagrī vaiśiṣṭyabhāvanasāmagrī tu 6 sāmagrīdvayasahitā 7 tadubhayasaṃsargāgraharūpaiva,
GSP29vytrkt2u:4242: manmate pratyakṣe 'pi viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyābhyāmiva tatsaṃsargeṇāpīndriyapratyāsatterhetutvenehāpi pratyāsattisthānīyasya śaktijñānsayā 1 pyanvayāṃśe
GSP29vytrkt2u:4243: kiṃ ca pramāṇāntare 'pi pratyakṣamaryādānusaraṇasyāvaśakatve 'numitāvapi pakṣarūpaviśeṣyajñānaṃ kāraṇaṃ na syāt/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4245: anumitiśābdajñāne prati liṅgaśabdayorjñānaṃ vyāptiśaktyojñānaṃ ca heturna syāt/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4251: yadyapi siddhānte ghaṭādau taddharmāṇāṃ ghaṭādinā na saṃsargaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4253: tathāpi daṇḍītyādau daṇḍadevadattasaṃyogopagamena daṇḍadevadattābhyāmiva tadubhayasaṃyogenāpīndriyasya saṃyogarūpapratyāsatteraṅgīkārāditi bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4256: nanu nyāyamate prāguktasāmagrīdvayasahitādasaṃsargāgrahādeva pratyakṣasthala iva saṃsargāgrahopapattau nādhikakalpanāvasara ityata āha-- kiṃ ceti// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:4268: gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityādau ghoṣatīrādyanvaye vyabhicāranirāsāya hetau vinetyantoktiḥ//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4273: nanu yaduktaṃ anvayaḥ padaśakyaḥ vṛtyantaraṃ vinā śābdatvātpadārthavaditi/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4279: eteneti// yadvā śābdatvādityasiddhaṃ anvayabodhasya padārthakaraṇakatvāt śabdānuvidhānasyānyatropakṣayāditi matāntaraṃ cānūdya nirāha-- eteneti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4284: bodhakaṃ smṛta 1 padārtha eva tu tadbodhaka iti bhāṭṭamatamapāstam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4288: tasyātītānāgatādirūpatvena phalabhūtamanvayānubhavaṃ vyāpārā 3 bhimatāṃ padārthasmṛtiṃ ca prati kāraṇatvasyaivāsaṃbhavena tadviśeṣasya karaṇatvasya
GSP29vytrkt2u:4290: “padārthastanmatirvā syāditi“bhāṭṭokternivyāpārasya kathaṃ karaṇatetyata uktaṃ smṛta iti/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4292: tairapi padārthānāmanvayabodhakatvaṃ kvāpyanupalabdhaṃ tāvatkalpanīyameveti sudhorkti hṛdi kṛtvā'ha -- evaṃ hīti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4321: tajjanyatve sati tajjanyajanakasyaivendriyasannikarṣādau vyāpāratvadarśanādiha ca śaktismṛteḥ padārthasmṛtipūrvabhāvanitvena tadajanyatvāditi
GSP29vytrkt2u:4323: evaṃ ca nirvyāpāramapi smaraṇaṃ karaṇaṃ syāt/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4324: smaraṇavyāpārakaṃ mana evavāstu karaṇamityato doṣāntaramāha -- vyutpattīti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4325: śabdasyaiva kāraṇatvagrahaṇācca na padārthasmṛtiranvayabodhaṃ prati kāraṇamityanuṣaṅgaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4327: na ca śabdenāyamartho jñāyata ityanubhavavirodhānna tyāgo yukta iti vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4330: śabdaguṇakamākāśamityādāvākāśe ākāśapadaśaktigrahahīnasyāpyākāśasya śabdamātraṃ prati kāraṇatvādākāśamiti padaṃ 6 pa3ti
GSP29vytrkt2u:4339: na ca -- padaṃ vināpi padārthajñānamātrāt kāvyādimūlānvayabodhadarśanādveṣādiśravaṇānantaraṃ śvetāśvo 2 dhāvatīti dhīdarśanācca,
GSP29vytrkt2u:4342: padārthasmṛteḥ karaṇatve maṇyuktaṃ doṣāntaraṃ cāha-- ghaṭa iti padaviśeṣeti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4349: padaṃ vināpīti kṛtacodyasya maṇyuktameva samādhiṃ spaṣṭhamāha -- yogajeti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4353: manasa eva kāvyādimūlasaṃsargānubhave utprekṣāsahakṛtasya tattadarthasmṛtivyāpārakasya manasa eva kāraṇatvāt//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4359: mama tu ayaṃ kālāgaruvahnimān nīlasurabhidhūmavatvāditivadayaṃ śveto dhāvadaśvo heṣākhuraniṣpeṣavatvādityanumānena /
GSP29vytrkt2u:4367: śveta iti pakṣaḥ dhāvadaśva iti sādhyam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4371: uktaṃ ca maṇikṛtāpi śvetośvo dhāvatīti dhīstu liṅgajeti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4372: nanvevaṃ vākye padārthasmaraṇamabhyupetya tasyoktadiśā nirvyāpāratvādinānvayabodhaṃ pratyakaraṇatvoktau nyāyamata iva 4
GSP29vytrkt2u:4377: vastutastu manmate vākyasthapadajñā 1 nānvayānubhavayormadhye padārthasmṛtireva nāsti/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4389: nanu vākye padārthānsmarāmītyanuvyavasāyābhāve 'pi vākyatvaṃ padaṃ padārthasmārakaṃ padatvādekaikaśaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4391: . asahāyapadatvamupādhīriti bhāvena sudhoktameva samādhimāha-- kiṃ tāvatetyādinā //
GSP29vytrkt2u:4392: astu ko doṣa ityata āha-- tathātva iti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4397: indriyaliṅgābhyāṃ sannikarṣavyāptyoriva śabedanāpi śakteranubhavarūpe 1 svaphale janayitavya eva svaviṣayeṇa saha saṃbandhatvenāna 2 pekṣitatvācca//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4401: - na tu saṃskāratvena tathātvena tajjanyasyaiva smṛtitvaṃ śabdetvavākyasthala iva
GSP29vytrkt2u:4402: vākyasthale 'pi śaktitvena śakteḥ padārthopasthitihetutvātsmṛtitvameva yuktamityata āha-- indriyeti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:4403: indriyaliṅgābhyasvaviṣaye jñāne janayitavye tathākramaṃ sannikarṣavyāptyoryathā saṃbandhatvenāpekṣitatvaṃ
GSP29vytrkt2u:4404: tathā vākya 4 smṛtaśabdenāpi svārthagocarānubhave janayitavye śakteḥ saṃbandhatvenaivāpekṣitatvena
GSP29vytrkt2u:4406: nanu śabda eva śakteḥ smārakatvaniyamo nānyatreti manvānaṃ pratyāha vyutpattīti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4408: na caivaṃ kevalapadasyāpi smārakatvaṃ na syāditi vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4412: nanu tu smārakatvenāgṛhītāyāḥ śakteravākyasthale kathaṃ smārakatvāmityatastatra śakterna smārakatvaṃ kiṃ tu
GSP29vytrkt2u:4426: smārakatvena sāhacaryaniyamo nāvaśyaka iti sūcanāya hastineti dṛṣṭantoktiḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4427: tathā cānanyathāsiddhatvādanubhava eva śakterupayogaḥ svīkārya iti bhāvaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4429: ca padārthayoḥ saṃbandhitvātsaṃbandhajñānasya ca saṃbandhijñānapūrvakatvasya ghaṭapaṭasaṃyogādipratyakṣe
GSP29vytrkt2u:4431: tathā ca kathaṃ madhye padārthasmṛtireva netyuktirityata āha-- saṃbandheti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4436: phalamityuktaṃ taddhṛdi kṛtvā śaṅkate -- na caivamiti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4446: nanu śaktiranvayāṃśe svarūpasatī padārthāṃśe tu jñātopayujyata iti kubjaśaktipakṣe
GSP29vytrkt2u:4447: padajñānānvabodhayormadhye śaktijñānaṃ nāstyeveti kathaṃ tasya vyāpāratetyata āha-- svīkṛtā hīti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:4448: padārthasmṛtyarthaṃ tvayāpyaṅgīkṛtatvādasmābhiścānvayāṃśe 'pi śaktijñānamāvaśyakamiti sādhitatvācca bhavati śaktijñānamavāntaravyāpāra iti bhāvaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4485: etena -- padārthamātre śaktasya padasya padārtha saṃbandhinyasya 1 ye lakṣaṇaiveti nirastam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4491: yathā pravāhe śaktasya gaṅgāpadasya tatsaṃbandhini tīre lakṣaṇā tatheti bhāvaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4497: nanu lakṣaṇāpakṣe hastinā hastipaparasmṛteri 6 vetyādinā pūrvoktidiśā śaktiṃ vināpi padārthasmṛtisambhavena padārtheṣvapi śaktirnopayeti lāghavamiti
GSP29vytrkt2u:4501: yā tu sudhāyā“manvayo 7 lakṣyata iti cettarhi padārtheṣu sāhacaryātsmārakatvamātram/ @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:4505: kiṃ caivaṃ“vailā tattīranīrayo“ityānuśāsanātkevala 1 tīre śaktasya velāpadasya kevalamātsarve śaktasya matsarapadasya 2 viśiṣṭe lakṣaṇasaṃbhavena,
GSP29vytrkt2u:4507: evaṃ jātimātre śaktasya gavādipadasya jātyākṛtiviśiṣṭavyaktau 3 ca lakṣaṇāsaṃbhavena jātyākṛtiviśiṣṭavyaktau śaktiśca na syāt/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4508: yadi ca velādipadasya nīrādau tadviśiṣṭatīrādau ca prayogaprācuryānnīrādyanupapattya 4 nusaṃdhānaṃ vinaiva viśiṣṭapratīteśca na tatra lakṣaṇā
GSP29vytrkt2u:4509: tarhi tata evānvasya viśaṣṭepi na lakṣaṇā //
GSP29vytrkt2u:4511: anvaye tu lakṣaṇeti padānāṃ na kutrāpyabhidhā 5 vṛttiriti syā“dityuktiḥ svārthān smārayantyanya 6 parāṇi padānīti pūrvaprakṛtamatāntarābhiprāyeti 7 jñātavyam//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4513: ekaikatra śaktasyānyatra tatsambandhini prayogaprācuryasatve lakṣaṇāmupetya śaktyapalāpe satītyarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4518: paramukhenaiva hetudvayoktipūrvaṃ samādhiṃ vācayati-- yadi ceti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4529: api ca pratītānvayānupapatyaiva lakṣaṇeti lakṣaṇātaḥ prāganvaye dhīḥ svīkāryeti kathaṃ lakṣaṇayānvayadhīḥ//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4544: tatra kaḥ padārthaḥ kiṃ jātiruta vyaktirita tatrāha-- padārthastvityādinā -- prakaraṇapañcakena / @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:4549: anirdhāritayatkiñcidvyakteḥ śakyatve kā vyaktiśśakyetyanadhyavasāyena gāndadyādityādi vākyātpravṛttirna syāt/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4550: sarvasyāḥ pratyekaṃ śakyatve yatra śaktigrahastatraiva śābdadhīḥ syāt/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4554: vyaktya eva vācyā iti paddhatyukteriti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4564: vyaktau śaktiriti vadatā vaktavyam kimekasyāṃ vyaktāvatha sarvāsu vyaktiṣviti/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4565: antyepi kiṃ pratyekaṃ tattadvyaktiṣu pṛthakpṛthakśaktiruta sarvatvena rūpeṇa sarvāsvapi vyaktiṣvekaiva /
GSP29vytrkt2u:4568: ekadā sarvāsāmupasthityayogena pratyekaṃ sarvāsu śaktigrahāyogena kvacideveti vācyatvāditi bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4570: gāmiti padena sarvagovyaktyupasthityā sarvāsāmapi dānakarmatvapratīteriti bhāvaḥ// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:4573: tasmācchakyavyaktyanugamāyāśakyavyaktivyāvṛttaye ca sarvaikodāsīnyena viśeṣaṇena vopakṣaṇena vā gotvenāvacchinnā vyaktiḥ śakyati śaktigraho
GSP29vytrkt2u:4574: tathā ca svata evānyavyāvṛttagotvasya prathamopasthitatvāllaghutvācca nāgṛhītaviśeṣaṇanyāyena jātireva śakyā//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4575: nanu vyaktau śaktyabhāvena kathaṃ śabdāttadvīriti cet/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4578: evaṃ vyaktipakṣe bādhakamuktvā svapakṣamupasaṃhāramukhena sayuktimāha -- tasmāditi//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4591: yattu maṇau prābhākaramatānuvādaprastāve kustatarhi vyaktidhīrityāśaṅkya gopadaṃ hi niyamato jātivyaktī bodhayatītyādinā prābhākaramatamūhitaṃ tanniṣkṛṣyāha-- satyamityādinā//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4595: kiṃ tvagṛhītaśaktikasya 1 bālasyārthābodhātkutra cicchaktijñānaṃ sahakāri kalpanīyam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4596: tatra jātyaṃśe śaktijñānasyaiva jātiśaktijñānatvena kāraṇatā kalpyate /
GSP29vytrkt2u:4608: kuta ityato viśiṣṭaśaktijñānatvena kāraṇatāgrāhakakamānābhāvādityāha-- jātyaṃśa iti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4611: atha vā jātiśaktijñānājjātidhīrbhavantī vyaktimapi bodhayatītyādinā maṇyukta 5 māha-yadveti// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:4614: -jātervyaktighaṭitamūrtitvena vyaktimanādāya jātibodhanā 1 śaktā tāmādāyaiva jātiṃ bodhayati/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4615: 2 yathā buddhimaddhetukānumititvena kāryatve 3 buddhimaddhetukavyāpya 4 tvena ca 5 kāraṇatve siddhe kṣityādau kāryatvena hetunā jāyamānānumitirbuddhinityatvamādāya
GSP29vytrkt2u:4621: kṣityādikaṃ buddhimaddhetukaṃ kāryatvāt ghaṭavaditīśvarānumāne kṣityādiniṣṭhakāryatvahetunā kṣityādeḥ 6 siddhyadbuddhimajjanyatvaṃ nityabuddhimajjanyatvaṃ
GSP29vytrkt2u:4623: loke ghaṭādikārye ca buddhimaddhetukatvagocarānumititvena buddhimajjanyatvavyāpyakāryatvavatvena kāryakāraṇabhāvagraho na nityatvagarbhitabuddhimaddhetukatvānumititvenāpi/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4625: kimanena niyāmakamuktaṃ syādityata āha -- etadeva hīti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4633: ucyate -- yena rūpeṇopasthite saṃbandhini yasya saṃbandho gṛhyate tena rūpeṇaikasaṃbandhipratītiraparasaṃbandhinaṃ
GSP29vytrkt2u:4634: jñāpayatītyanumityādau kḷpta 1 kāryakāraṇabhāvasāmānyamatikramya sāpagryantakalpanā na yuktā / @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:4635: īśvarānumāne 'pi buddhimajjanyatvānu 2 mitiṃ viśiṣṭavyaktau śabdaśaktimupetyāpi śaktijñānasya
GSP29vytrkt2u:4636: jātiśaktijñānatvenaiva jātiviśiṣṭavyaktijñānaṃ prati kāraṇatvaṃ tatra ca tadviśiṣṭatvaṃ
GSP29vytrkt2u:4639: dhūmatvādinā rūpeṇopasthite dhūmādau saṃbandhini yasya saṃbandhaḥ yannirūpitaḥ saṃbandho vahninirūpito vyāptilakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandho gṛhyate,
GSP29vytrkt2u:4640: tena rūpeṇa dhūmarūpaikasaṃbandhapratītiḥ vahnilakṣaṇamaparasaṃbandhinaṃ jñāpayatītyanumitisthale hasti hastipādismṛtyādisthale ca kḷptam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4641: tathaiva śabdasthale 'pi govadatvena rūpeṇa gopadarūpe saṃbandhinyupasthite gotvaviśiṣṭagovyaktinirūpitaḥ
GSP29vytrkt2u:4642: śaktilakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandhogṛhīta iti gopadatvena rūpeṇa gopadarūpaikasaṃbandhipratītiraparaṃ
GSP29vytrkt2u:4644: tathā ca gopadajñānatvenaiva gorūpārthajñānatvena ca kāryakāraṇabhāvasaṃbhave jātiviśiṣṭavyaktijñāne
GSP29vytrkt2u:4654: jātiviśiṣṭapyaktiviṣayakaśābdajñānatvena kāryateti viparītaṃ kiṃ na syāt/ @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:4655: iti śvokasya jātyanvite svārthe vyaktau śaktiranubhūyate śabdānāṃ ato jātyanvitavya 1 ktyabhidhāyitvaṃ,
GSP29vytrkt2u:4658: nanvanyalabhyepi vyaktijñāne vyaktiśaktijñānatvenāpi kāraṇatvakalpane gauravaṃ tulyamevetyata āha-- kiṃ caivamiti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4660: nanu jātervyaktighaṭimūrtitvājjātibhānaṃ vyaktibhānaṃ vinā na yuktam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4661: na tu vyakti bhānaṃ jātiṃ vineti/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4664: nanu vyaktau jāterviśeṣaṇatvānnāgṛhīviśeṣaṇanyāyena jātiśaktijñānatvenaiva hetutvamiti cenna/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4665: vyakterapi jātau viśeṣaṇatvātkramikopastathitisthala eva nāgṛhītetinyāyāvatāreṇa tulyavittivedyajātivyaktisthale tadanavatārācca/.
GSP29vytrkt2u:4668: nāgṛhīteti nyāyamabhyupetyāpabi doṣāntaramāha-- kiṃ ca muṇḍita iti// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:4674: kiṃ ca muṇḍite gotve na śaktigrahaḥ,
GSP29vytrkt2u:4676: ki tu vyaktyā viśeṣite gotve śaktigraha iti nāgṛhītaviśeṣaṇanyāyo viparītaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4677: na ca gotvasya svata eva 1 vilakṣaṇatvātsvataḥ siddhenetaravyāvṛttatvena jñāte gotve śaktigraha iti vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4680: na ca gotvatvena jñāne gotve śaktigrahaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4681: gavetarāvṛttitve sati gotvavṛttitvādanyasya 2 gotvatvasyābhāvena gotvatve vyakterdviranupraveśāt// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:4683: svata evānyavyāvṛtteti prāguktamāśaṅkya nirāha-- na ceti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4692: kiṃ caivaṃ tvadabhimatā 1 gaṅgāśabdādestīrādau lakṣaṇā maṇḍapaṃ maṇḍapaśabdasya gṛhaviśeṣasaṃbandhini puruṣe rūḍhipūrvikā lakṣaṇā ca na syāt/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4694: tīrapuruṣau tu lakṣaṇāṃ vinā nāgṛhītaviśeṣaṇanyāyena vā
GSP29vytrkt2u:4696: kiṃ ca vyakteraśakyatve tatra vibhaktyar 2 thānvayo na syāt//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4697: na ca vyakteraśakyatvepyekavittivedyatayā prakṛtipratipādyatvādvibhaktyarthānvaya iti vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4712: jātāveva śaktiḥ vyaktidhīstvekavittivedyatvena bhaviṣyatīti matena vā 4 syāvatārādadoṣaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4714: 1.tagaṃ -rā.su.naṃ. 2.ktyanvayo- ja.ka. 3.tinajā-naṃ-'na' iti rekhayā dūṣitam -e. 4.vāsya doṣasyā -u. naṃ. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:4718: api ca pūrvamānayeti mukhyaprayoge 'parasyāpi vibhaktyarthānvayaḥ tadadhīnaḥ kriyānvayaśca 1 na syāt//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4719: api ca jātimātrasya padārthatve gopadājjātiviśiṣṭavyaktidhīrna syāt/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4723: pūrvamānayeti pūrvapadaṃ prayuṅta tatra pūrvaprātipadikasyāparapadārthalakṣaṇā na syāt/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4730: lakṣyābhiprāyaṃ vinaiva yatra pūrvamānayeti mukhyārthaprayogastatra sthale pūrvaprātipadikātparatra śrutivibhaktyarthakarmatvānvayo 'parapadārthe
GSP29vytrkt2u:4732: astu ko doṣa ityata āha -- tadadhīna iti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4733: tathā ca pūrvamānayetyukte aparasyānayanaprasaṅgoparamānetyuktaṃ pūrvasyānayanaprasaṅga ityarthaḥ/ @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:4737: kiñcoktanyāyena vyaktiviśeṣaṇakagotve śaktirjñāneti tajjanyā śābda 2 dhīrapi vyaktiviśeṣita gotvaviśeṣaṇakavyaktiviṣayā syāt/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4741: vyaktyaṃśa eva śaktijñānaṃ heturiti vaiparī 4 tyāpattiḥ,
GSP29vytrkt2u:4744: gavādipadānāṃ jātāvena śaktau gaṅgādiśabdānāṃ tīratvādāvena lakṣaṇāprasaṅgaḥ,
GSP29vytrkt2u:4767: lakṣaṇāyā ākṣepato vā vyaktidhīsaṃbhavādananyalabhyajātāveva śaktiriti matamapyanūdya nirāha -- bhāṭṭāstviti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4769: vyaktau śaktiriti pakṣe prativyakti śaktigrahau na saṃbhavati/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4771: ekasyāṃ vyaktau śaktigrahe ca śabdaśravaṇato vyaktanyantarasyāpyupasthitidarśanena tatra śaktigraho vyabhicāri/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4780: yadvā vyakti 1 stvākṣepalabhyeti na tatra vṛttiḥ kalpyetyāhuḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4783: yadyapi maṇau bhaṭṭamate tu vyaktistvapekṣepalabhyetyuktvā'kṣepapakṣa eva doṣānuktvā--
GSP29vytrkt2u:4786: iti maṇḍanaślokaṃ saṃmatitvenoktvā lakṣamaṇāpakṣaṃ maṇḍanamatatvenopanyasya khaṇḍitavān/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4791: iti/ lakṣyeti pakṣe prāguktadoṣo netyāha -- evaṃ ceti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4804: kiṃ ca gaṅgātvādirūpātsvārthādanyena tīratvādinā rūpeṇopasthita eva tīrādau gaṅgādipadasya lakṣaṇā dṛṣṭā/ na
GSP29vytrkt2u:4807: kākebhyo dadhi rakṣyatāmityādāvapi kākatvādanyena dadhyupaghātatvādinopasthita eva lakṣaṇā //
GSP29vytrkt2u:4815: kuta ityato lākṣaṇikaṃ padaṃ nānubhāvakamiti yanmataṃ tatpakṣa iti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:4817: anyena rūpeṇopasthita eva lakṣaṇetyasya vyabhicāramāśaṅkyā 1 ha kākebhya iti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4818: na kevalamanyena rūpeṇopasthitirūpa 2 bījābhāvo mukhyārthānupapattipratisandhānarūpamapi lakṣaṇābījaṃ nāstītyāha -- kiṃ ca gāmiti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4823: pratyuta gaurnityā gaurjātirityādau vyaktyanvayānupapattyaiva jātidhīriti tatraiva lakṣaṇā //
GSP29vytrkt2u:4824: kiṃ ca yasyāṃ vyaktānānayanādivyavahāreṇa śaktigrahaḥ evaṃ gaurnaṣṭā gaurdīrghā gauḥ
GSP29vytrkt2u:4825: śuklā gauḥ sāsnādimatī gauranekā gaurgacchati gāmānaya gāṃ badhānetyādau prayogapratītyayoḥ prācuryaṃ ca,
GSP29vytrkt2u:4826: tasyāṃ vyaktau lakṣaṇā tadviparītāyāṃ jātau śaktiriti sādhvīyaṃ vyavasthā/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4828: kiṃ cānityatvanityatvānumānayorghaṭe dṛṣṭāntite ghaṭaśabdamukhyārthasya ghaṭatvasya nityatvātkrameṇa sādhyavaikalyatadabhāvau syātām / @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:4831: sa ca vyavahāra ānayanādiyogyavyaktāvevaitasyāṃ lakṣaṇā cet kathaṃ na pramitatyāgaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4832: tadrahite jātau śaktigrahaścet kathaṃ nāpramitasvīkāra ityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4834: yathā vyaktau śaktigrahastathā prayogapratītyoḥ prācuryaṃ ca yasyāṃ vyaktau tasyāṃ lakṣaṇeti yojanā/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4839: śabdo 'nityaḥ kṛtakatvāt ghaṭavadityanumāne ghaṭapadamukhyārthasya ghaṭatvasyaiva dṛṣṭāntatvāpatyā sadhyavaikalya 1 doṣaḥ syāt/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4840: tathā pṛthivī nityā gandhavatvādityanumāne ca sādhyavaikalyābhāvaḥ syāt/ @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:4866: kiṃ ca dhūmākṣiptavahneriva vyakteraśābdatvena vibhaktyarthānvayo na syāt // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:4876: na ca pūrvādipadārthasthale samānavittivedyatvameva na tvākṣepyākṣapakabhāva iti śaṅkyam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4878: nanu-- jāterānayanānupapattervyakterānayanabalācca śabdādākṣiptasyāpi kathaṃ cicchāpda 5 mupetya vibhaktyarthānvayo vācya iti cenna/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4881: astu vā śābdatvaṃ kathañcit tathāpi vyakteraśakyatvapakṣe gotvādijātirvyaktyāśritā jātitvādityevaṃ rūpeṇa hi jātyā vyaktyākṣepo
GSP29vytrkt2u:4882: vācyaḥ/ tatra ca kriyānvayo vyakterdurlabha ityāha -- kiṃ ca jātiriti// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:4886: kiṃ ca jātirvyaktyāśritetyākṣepe jātirūpa pakṣaviśeṣaṇībhūtāśritatvopasarjanībhūtayā vyakteḥ śābdatve 'pyusarjanatvādrājapuruṣamānayetyatra rājñaivānayanā 1 nvayo na syāt//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4887: api ca bahnyavivakṣayā prayuktena dhūmapadena vahneriva gaurastītyādau vyaktyavivakṣayā prayuktena gau 2 padena vyaktidhīrna /
GSP29vytrkt2u:4889: ityākṣepe // evaṃ prakāreṇa vyakti 3 pratītau satyām/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4890: gotvādijātirūpapakṣe viśeṣaṇībhūtaṃ yadāśritatvaṃ tatra nirūpakatayā upasarjanībhūtāyā ityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4891: pūrvatra hyākṣepāvdyaktibuddhimupetya subardhānvayastathā kriyānvayaśca na yukta ityuktam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4892: adhunā vyaktidhīrevākṣepapakṣe na yuktetyāha -- api ceti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4893: vahnirivakṣayā dhūmamātraviṣayokte yathā na vahnidhīstathā gaurasti gāṃ paśyetyādau jātimātravivakṣayā prayuktena vyaktidhīrna syāt/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4894: vyaktatitātparyānupapatyā vā anvayānupapatyā vā ākṣepo vyaktervācyaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4907: kiṃ ca gotvena na tāvadgotvā 1 diviśiṣṭā vyaktirākṣepyā/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4914: ādye āpakṣepakatvāyogaḥ antyayoranubhavavirodha iti bhāvenāha-- kiṃ ca gotveneti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4919: liṅgena vināpi vahnitvādinā dharmeṇa tatra laiṅgikasyopasthitisaṃbhave 'pi sāmagrībalālliṅgasyāpi tatra bhānam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4934: na ca vyaktiṃ vinā tadavacchedakamastīti vyakteḥ prāgeva buddhatayā kathamākṣepyatvam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4935: anyathā gauriti 1 pratyakṣajñānasyāpi jātireva viṣayo vyaktistvākṣepyeti syāt/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4958: nayāyikāstu -- jātyākṛtiviśiṣṭā vyaktiḥ padārathaḥ jātyākṛtivyaktyaḥ padārtha iti sūtre eka cānāt/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4961: piṣṭa 2 mayyo gāva ityādau tu gavākṛtisadṛśākṛtau gauṇī/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4964: evaṃ padarthastu vyaktereti pratijñātārthasiddhaye prābhākarabhāṭṭamataṃ nirasya nyāyamatamapi nirasituṃ padaśaktivādānte jātirviśeṣavadavayavasaṃyogarūpākṛtirapi
GSP29vytrkt2u:4971: anyathā jātyādeḥ pratyekaṃ śakyatve padārthā iti bahuvacanoktiḥ syāt/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4976: tathāpi gau 2 rūpapannetyādau vyakteḥ svātantryeṇopasthiteḥ gotvasyāvacchedakatayāpyanvayena
GSP29vytrkt2u:4977: lakṣaṇānāpatteḥ jātimātraparatvamityevānuvādau na 3 tu jātyādimātraparatvamityanuvādaḥ kutaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:4978: ākṛterapi 4 śakyatve piṣṭamayyo gāva ityādau amukhyatvaṃ gopadāderna ityādityata āha-- piṣṭeti// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:4982: tanna/ guṇakarmādipadeṣu tadviṣeṣasparśarūpotkṣepaṇā 1 pakṣepaṇādipadeṣu dravyaviśeṣātmādipadeṣu cāvayavasaṃyogaviśeṣa 3 rūpākṛtere 3 vābhāvāt/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4984: avayaveti// kapālādyavayavānāṃ yaḥ saṃyogaviśeṣaḥ sa ityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4986: yāvat/ kiṃ sarvatrāpyākṛtirapi śabdārtha uta yatrāsti sā tadvācakapadeṣu /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5009: evamakāśādipadena śabdāśrayatvāderapari pratītyā tadviśiṣṭā vyaktirākāśādipadārthaḥ syāt/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5015: anyathā gopadādākṛterapi vyaktyaikavittivedyatvaṃ na syāditya āha-- kiñceti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5016: yadvā ākṛteḥ śakyatvamasādhāraṇyena nirasya parābhimatānugatajāterapi na śakyatvamiti bhāvena taduktayuktervyabhicāramāha -- kiṃ ceti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5024: etenānvite svārtha vyaktimātrarūpe svārthe iti pūrvatripādisthasvārthaśabdārtha iti darśitam/ @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:5028: kiṃ cākṛtera 1 pi gośabdārthatve gauḥ sāsnādimatītyatra sāsnādimatpadaṃ punaruktam syāt//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5029: kiṃ ca viśiṣṭā vyaktiḥ padārtha iti kor'thaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5030: anekā vyaktaya ekena gotveneva jātyādi 2 trayamekena kroḍīkṛtamekapadārtha iti vā,
GSP29vytrkt2u:5035: nanvākṛterākṣepalabhyatve tatra vibhaktyarthānvayenānayanādikriyānvayo 'pi na syāditi cet/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5041: saha prayogānupapattidoṣaṃ cāha -- kiṃ cākṛte 5 rapīti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5043: vyaktimātrasya śakyatvaṃ sunirvāhaṃ na tu viśiṣṭasya vikalpāsahatvāditi bhāvena tredhā vikalpya krameṇa nirāha -- kiṃ ca viśiṣṭeti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:5048: kiṃ vā vyaktireva śakyā jātyākṛtau tu pravṛttinimitte iti/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5050: dvitīye vyaktidviśiṣṭasyāpyanantyādviśiṣṭatvasya cājātitvenānanugatatvādanugatasya ca gotvasyānanugataśakyaśarīra eva praveśādananugamatādavasthyam//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5051: kiṃ caivaṃ śābdadhīrviśiṣṭavi 1 ṣayakā viśiṣṭatvaprakārikā ca syāt/ @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:5056: yadvā - ekavittivedyatvameva trayāṇāṃ kroḍīkārako dharma iti cenna/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5059: tathāpi tasya padārthatāvacchedakatve śabdācchakyatāvacchedakaprakāreṇa śakyabhānaniyamena tena rūpeṇa jātyāderbhānaṃ syāt/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5062: śābdabuddheḥ śakyatāvacchedakaprakāreṇa śakyaviśeṣyakatvaniyamādviśiṣṭasya śakyatāvacchedakatve tatprakārikā viśiṣṭaviśeṣyakā dhīḥ syādityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5071: kiṃ ca 1 jātyākṛtyormadhye eka 2 viśeṣitamaparaṃ pravṛttinimittaṃ,
GSP29vytrkt2u:5072: kiṃ vā svatantre ubhe api pravṛttinimitte/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5076: dvitīye samuditayoḥ pravṛttinimittatve jātivādākṛterapi pravṛttinimittatvena gośabdottaratvapratya-- @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:5078: ākhyātaśabditatiṅgvācyatāvacchedakaṃ kṛtitvaṃ na tu kṛtyakṛtisādhāraṇavyāpāratvaṃ kṛtimatvādikaṃ vā yathā tathātrāpi jātirevacchedikā na tūbhayam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5080: na kevalagamaucityaprāptaṃ yuktaṃ caivamevānyathā 3 nupapatterityaha -- kiṃ ceti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5081: yadvā jātyākṛtyorghaṭaṃ prati daṇḍacakrayorivāvadhṛtamevamato na doṣa ityata āha-- kiṃ ceti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5082: dvayornimittatvaṃ vadan praṣṭavyaḥ kiṃ viṣṇave śipiṣṭāyetyādau viśiṣṭaniṣṭhadevatātvamiva
GSP29vytrkt2u:5085: vā nimittatvaṃ uta daṇḍacakrādiriva pratyekamevayeti hṛdi vikalpyādya āha -- samuditayoriti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:5091: api cobhayornimittatve 'nugatābhyāṃ jātyākṛtibhyāṃ kṛṣyamāṇā vyaktiḥ triśaṅkuvannānugatā nāpyananugateti syāt/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5094: gośabdāduttaraḥ parataḥ śrūyamāṇo yaḥ tvapratyayaḥ tasyetyarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5096: tvayā ca dvayornimittatvopagamena dvayorapi tvapratyayabdārthatvāditi bhāvaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5100: triśaṅkurnāma rājā viśvāmitreṇa svargaṃ prāpitopi devaiḥ pātyamāno viśvāmitreṇa pratirudhyāmāno
GSP29vytrkt2u:5101: na patati devairniṣkāsyamāno na svargaṃ ca prāpnoti yathā tathaiva vyaktirapyananugatatvādanugatatvabahirbhūtā syāt /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5102: tathā ca vyaktau śaktigraho duḥśaka āpādyeta ityananugatāyā ākṛternimittatvaṃ vihāya kevalajātereva tadupeyamiti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5103: avayavasaṃyogatvādinā rūpeṇākṛterapyanugamo 'stu evaṃ ca noktadoṣa ityata āha-- akṛterapīti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5106: dvitīye 'pi dvitīyaṃ pratyekaṃ nimittatvapakṣaṃ nirāha -- ubhayoriti// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:5107: 1.ti vācyam/ api gotvaśabdayorubhayārthakatve jātāvākṛtau cānugatasyaikasya pravṛttinimittatvābhāvādgośabdo nānārthakaḥ syāditi/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5111: ubhayoḥ pratyekaṃ nimittatve piṣṭa 1 mayyo gāva ityatra gauṇatvaṃ na syāt/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5113: a 2 pi ca gotvamanityamityādyapi pramāṇaṃ syāt /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5115: apica gośabdasya 3 gotvaśabdasya 4 cākṣaśabdavadakṣatvaśabdāvacca nānārthatvaṃ syāt/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5119: nanvākṛtiśabdena mukhyā 5 kṛtirevāvayavasaṃyogaviśeṣasya ityata āha-- api ceti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5120: jātyākṛtyoḥ padārthatvapakṣe cobhayatrāpi doṣamāha-- api ca gośabdasyeti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5123: astu ko doṣa ityata āha -- ubha 6 yoriti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5125: akṣāṇyāneyetyādāvanekavajātīyā 7 kṣābhiprāyeṇa prayuktasthale yathā yugatadubhayadhī tathātrāpi jātyākṛtyo 'rapi dhīḥ/ sā
GSP29vytrkt2u:5135: svantrayorubhayoḥ pravṛttinimittatvepi samuditayoḥ pravṛtti timittatve gotvaṃ nityamityāderaprāmāṇyāpattiḥ,
GSP29vytrkt2u:5140: jātyākṛtī 2 ti tu pravṛttinimitte iti pakṣe jātireva pravṛttinimittatvaucityādityabhipretamāha -- gauravamiti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5141: dvayornimittatvapakṣasyaiva parābhimatatvādetaddoṣasya 3 saṃgraho na pūrvakalpadvayasyeti jñeyam//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5156: jātyādikaṃ tu pratyekaṃ teṣu teṣu śabdeṣu pravṛttinimittam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5158: te te vyāvṛttākārā eva taistairvyāvṛttairdravyakarmasāmānyairnimittaiḥ tattacchabdavācyā iti/ @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:5160: nanvevaṃ vādyantarairuktapakṣacatuṣṭayasyāpyayoge kastarhi padasyārtha ityataḥ prākpratijñānatameva sapramāṇakaṃ smārayati -- tasmāditi//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5166: sarvatra vyaktīnāmeva vācyatvādityata āha-- jātyādikaṃ tvitipratyekamiti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5167: jātiśabde 1 jātiḥ guṇaśabdena guṇa ityevaṃ pratyekamityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5168: jātyādinimittā 2 vyaktaya eva vācyā ityatra saṃmatimāha -- uktaṃ hīti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5170: tādṛśo 'yaṃ ca tacchabda iti jñāpayati sphuṭam //
GSP29vytrkt2u:5177: na ca gotvasya pravṛttinimittatve śakyatāvacchedakatvena pṛthivīśabde 1 na gandhavatvasyevāśakyatvaṃ syāt/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5181: yathā pṛthivītvajātinimittake pṛthivīśabde gandhavatvaṃ tasya pṛthivīśabdaśakyatayā 2 samanīyatatve 'pi gandhavattayājñāta eva pṛthivīśabdaśakter 3 grahāt/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5186: daṇḍī kuṇḍalītyevamādayaḥ śabdāḥ daṇḍādirūpadravyanimittakā iti tadabhiprāyeṇa dravyetyuktiḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5195: nanu gandhavatvasyāpi pṛthivīśabdavācyatvasamaniyatatvenāvyabhicārātkuto na nimittatvamityata āha -- tasyeti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5196: gandhavatvasya gurutvena tajjñānaṃ vinaiva laghubhūtapṛthivītvajñānenaiva tacchabdaśaktigrahāditi bhāvaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5205: yo hyetacchabdaniṣṭhaśakterayaṃ bhāsate sa eva śakyaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5206: śaktiṃ prati viṣayatayā bhānaṃ ca viśeṣyarūpāyāṃ vyaktāvina viśeṣaṇabhūte gotve 'pyastyeva /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5210: nāpi tatpravṛttinimitta“miti sudhokteḥ śaktigrahe tajjñānasyānapekṣitatvādgurutvācceti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5213: ca pratipādayati pṛthivītyādikaṃ ca pravṛttinimittaṃ bhavattavdyavahāramātrakāraṇaṃ
GSP29vytrkt2u:5224: śakyatve śakyamidaṃ idaṃ tu śaktau nimittamiti vyavasthānupapatteścetya ādyaṃ tāvannirāha -- yuktaṃ ceti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5231: śakyatvāviśeṣepīdaṃ pravṛttinimittamidaṃ neti vyavasthā tu viśeṣaṇatvaviśeṣyatvābhyām//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5232: ata eva śakyatve śakyavṛttitve ca sati svabhinnaśakyaṃ pratyanadhikaraṇatvaṃ pravṛttinimittatvamityāhuḥ//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5234: sākṣātkārajanakatāvacchedakasyāpi pratyakṣe janakatvena svasyāpi janakatvādarśanāditi bhāvaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt2u:5235: jātāvedatadbhāvo na dṛṣṭa ityata āha -- ghaṭoya'miti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:5240: śabdāttadhīstu vyaktiśaktādevākṣepata ityupeyatāmityata āha-- eta eveti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5242: pṛthivyādiśabdapravṛttinimittatve gandhavatvādau pṛthivyādiśabdaśakyapṛthivyādikaṃ pratyanidhikaraṇe pṛthivyādivṛttimatyativyāptinirāsāya śakyatve
GSP29vytrkt2u:5248: yadvā pūrvokta 1 jñāne śaktiṃ prati viṣayatayā bhāsamānatve sati yadviśeṣyaṃ tadeva śakyam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5254: prameyatvasya kevalānvayitvena svavṛttitayā śakyatve sati śakya 3 vṛttitvādataḥ svabhinnaṃ śakyaṃ pratyanadhikaraṇatva 4 mityuktam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5262: śabdaśaktyaviṣayatve gośabdādgauriti viśiṣṭadhīrna syādityata āha-- śabdāditi//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5267: yathā ḍitthādiśabdaḥ kasmiṃścitsaṅketo lakṣaṇādimān mukhyavṛttimānvā yathā na bhavati,
GSP29vytrkt2u:5272: na ca tīrasya saṃyogena tīratvasya tu saṃyuktasamavāyena dhīriti vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5274: kiṃ ca gaṅgāpadena tīratatīratvayorbhinnasaṃbandhe 1 na nānārthākṣādipadena tadarthānāmiva tīratītvayorapi svatantrayoreva bodhāpatyā tīratvaviśiṣṭatīradhīrna syāt // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:5275: nanu tatrākāśa bodhe 'pi vṛtteravyāpāratvādvyaktibodha iva śabdāśrayatvarūpadharmabodhopi setsyati /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5276: vyaktyaṃśe vṛttidvārā bodhakasya gotvādidharmāṃśe vṛttiṃ vinā kathaṃ bodhakatvaṃ śabdasyetyata āha -- kathaṃ ceti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5280: astu gaṅgāyāṃ mīnaghoṣāvityatreva vṛttidvayamityata āha -- kiṃ ceti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5281: yadvā -- pūrvaṃ śakyasaṃyogena tīrabodhe paścācchakyasaṃyuktasamavāyena tīratvabodhostu /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5282: evaṃ ca na yugapadvṛttidvayāpattirityata āha -- kiṃ ceti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5285: 2 dvārakatvena tatra śabdātteṣāṃ svatantrāṇāmevārthānāmupasthitāvapi gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa
GSP29vytrkt2u:5292: 1.ndhavatvena -ja.ka. ndhena bodhane-rā.su ndhena bodhane nānārthanāmiva tīra -ga. 2.tvadvācakatve -e. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:5295: na ca prathamaṃ 1 smṛta svatantrapadārthaviṣayiṇyevānāntaraṃ viśiṣṭānubhava iti vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5307: anantaraṃ viśiṣṭānubhava ityaṃśaṃ tāvaddarṣayati -- tvanmata iti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5308: nanu -- gaṅgāpadasyānanubhāvakatve 'pi ghoṣapadameva ghoṣānvayaṃ tīratīratvavaiśiṣṭyaṃ cānubhāvayatviti cenna/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5320: tasmācchaktijñānaṃ prati viśeṣyatvena viṣayatvādvyaktya eva vācyāḥ
GSP29vytrkt2u:5326: na tu tīratvavattīramiti viśiṣṭadhīḥ rājñaḥ puruṣa ityādāvivābhedavirodhivibhaktya
GSP29vytrkt2u:5328: na tu tīratīratvasamavāyarūpasaṃsarga 4 dhīrityāha -- tanmata iti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5332: gotvādikaṃ śakyamiti pakṣe 'śakyamiti pakṣe ca prāguktasudhāvākyameva saṃvādayati - atra ceti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5336: śodhitam -u. r4.gādityarthaḥ prathamaṃ smṛ-ityasti -naṃ. 'ditya' iti varṇayormadhye
GSP29vytrkt2u:5341: yattūktaṃ maṇāvasmācchabdādayamartho boddhavya itīcchārūpaḥ saṅketa eva śaktirna tvautpattikaḥ saṃbandha iti/ @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:5343: evaṃ kathamanvite śaktirityupakramya prakaraṇasaptakena padārthastvityupakramya prakaraṇapañcakena
GSP29vytrkt2u:5347: 3 thaiḥ śabdānāṃ nityayogopi naivāsmābhistyājya iti sudhākṛdabhihitāṃ śabdārthena
GSP29vytrkt2u:5350: iti jijñāsāsūtrānuvyākhyānasudhāyāṃ samyakppañcitaṃ manasi nidhāya parābhimatasaṅketapakṣe bādhakamātramāha -- yatviti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5355: tanna/ gaṅgā 1 padāttīraṃ pratyetvitīcchayaiva 2 gaṅgāśabdasya 3 prayogena tīre 'pi śaktiprasaṅgāt//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5356: na cāsmācchabdādāyaṃ sākṣātpratyetvitīcchā śaktiḥ tīre ca paparayā pratyetviccheti vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5359: sā ca na tīra iti vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5366: padādvyavahita tīrādau smṛteranubhavasya vā jāyāmānatvena padasyapadārthasmṛtyanubhavayorjanmani kārye sākṣātvasyāprayojakatvanetyarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5375: īśvarecchāyāḥ sanmātraviṣayatvena tasyā api tatra satvāt/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5376: na hi gaṅgāśabdāttīrabuddhau satyāmapi tādṛśīśvarecchā neti yuktam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5378: na cāsmātpadādamumarthamanubhavatvitīśvarecchā śaktiḥ sā ca tīre neti vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5381: na ca tādṛśecchayeśvaroccaritatvaṃ śaktiḥ sā ca na tīrestīti vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5392: tādṛśeśvaracchayoccaritatvaṃ śaktiriti hi tadā kalpanīyam yadi tādṛśeśvaracchayoccaritatvaṃ vinā vā tajjñānaṃ vinā vā padātpadārthajñānaṃ syāt/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5398: na ca dvādaśe 'hani pitā nāma kuryāditi sāmānyeneśvaroccāritatvaṃ tatrāpyastīti vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5404: dhūmena vahniṃ pratyetvitīśvarecchaiva cakṣurdhūmayorghaṭavahnibhyāṃ saṃbandho na tu saṃyogavyāptī iti syāt//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5406: devadattādipadārthabuddhau saṅketajñānasya kāraṇatvāvadhāraṇā 1 dityatrāpi tatkalpanāt ityādinā maṇau tathaiva spaṣṭaṃ pratīteriti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5407: ādhunikasaṅketasthale 'pyāptyuddhāramāśaṅkya nirāha -- na ca dvādaśa iti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5419: sarvagovyaktisaṅgrāhakasya śakyatāvacchedakasyaikasya gotvasyābhāvena śaktigrakāle sarvagovyaktyupasthityasaṃbhavātkathaṅgośabdasya sarvagovyaktyupasaṃhāreṇa śaktigrahaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5426: paddhatau coktaṃ samarthayamānaḥ sudhoktaṃ pūrvapakṣaṃ saṃkṣipyānuvadati -- nanu tvanmata iti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:5429: anugatajātipakṣe tu purovarticakṣuḥ saṃyuktaghaṭādau pratyakṣāvagataṃ ghaṭatvaṃ pratyāsattībhūya
GSP29vytrkt2u:5437: kāryatvakāraṇatvāvacchedakayoranugatayorghaṭatvadaṇḍatvayoścābhāve kathaṃ sarvopasaṃhāre 1 ṇa vyāpteḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvasya ca grahaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5439: vyaktyapekṣayā niyata 2 tvasya rāsabhe 'pi satvājjātyapekṣayā niyamasya tvanmate daṇḍādāvapyabhāvāt // @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:5442: tena ca dhūmavahnighaṭadaṇḍarūpasarvavyaktiniṣṭhavyāpyavyāpakabhāvagrahaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvagraho bhavati sa kathamityarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5443: māstu ko doṣaḥ purovartinoreva vyāpyādibhāvagrahostvityata āha -- kathaṃ ceti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:5448: tatra niyamaśca daṇḍe sati ghaṭaḥ tadabhāve tadabhāva iti vācyaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5449: sa ca daṇḍaghaṭarūpavyaktimādāya cettadā kasmiṃścit ghaṭe jāyamāne yatra rāsabho 'pi sannihitastatra rāsabhe sati ghaṭa ityasti niyama iti rāsabhasyāpi kāraṇatvagrahaḥ syāt /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5450: atha -- daṇḍatvāvacchinne sati ghaṭatvāvacchinnamityevaṃ niyamastu siddhāntino mate na yuktaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5453: tathā ca daṇḍāntarādau kāraṇatvāgyagrahe 'pi kāraṇatvādisvīkāre rāsabhāderapi svīkārāpatteḥ kāraṇākāraṇādivibhāgo na syādityarthaḥ / @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:5457: kiṃ ca kriyāvatvaṃ na dravyalakṣaṇam avyāpteḥ,
GSP29vytrkt2u:5465: kiṃ vā tatsaṃbhave 'pi kroḍīkāra 1 kasyaikasya gotvadhūmatvāderabhāve sarvagovyaktyādyupasaṃhāreṇa śaktivyāptyādigraho na saṃbhavatīti // @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:5466: anugatajātyabhāve doṣāntaramāha pūrva 1 vādi -- kiṃ ceti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:5470: kecicchabdāḥ ekaikārthāḥ kecitvakṣādiśabdā nānārthā ityādivyavasthā na syāditi gṛhyate /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5472: kuto na syādityataḥ krameṇa vyanakti -- tattaditi //
GSP29vytrkt2u:5482: manmate tu sādṛśyaṃ dhvaṃsādiva 4 tpratiyogitvena tattatsaṃbaddhamiti // @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:5486: iyaṃ gauriti vyaktiviśeṣa upadeśena gāmānayetyādivṛddhavyavahāreṇa tatrānvitatādipadopapattāvupamānakośādinā
GSP29vytrkt2u:5487: kāraṇatvagrahakāle bhūyorśanena vyāptigrahakāle anvayavyatirekadarśanena kāraṇatvagrahakāla ityarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5497: tathātve dhvaṃsāderapi tatpratiyogitvaṃ na syāditi bhāvaḥ // @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:5503: nanu tvanmate sādṛśyanātītādeḥ pratiyogitvarūpasaṃbandho nāneti cetkiṃ tāvatā /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5504: na hyekasmin jñāne eka eva saṃbandho heturiti niyamaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5506: nanvatītādyanāśritaṃ purovartimātrāśritaṃ sādṛśyaṃ kathamatītādyupasthāpayedityata āha -- yuktaṃ ceti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:5508: pratyabhijñāyāṃ jandanakhaṇḍa ityādyupanītamānādau ca saṃskārasyāntaḥ karaṇādyāśritasyāpi yathā cakṣurādipratyāsattitvaṃ tathetyarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5511: ātmasamavetasyāpi tattādismṛtirūpajñānasya pratyabhijñādau cakṣurādipratyāsattitvaṃ tatheti dhyeyam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5516: ato yāvanti pratiyogīni tāvatsu pratiyogitvānyapi tāvantyeveti bhinnabhinnāni /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5519: saṃbandhānekatvaṃ yugapadupasthitau na pratibandhakaṃ vyabhicārādityāha -- kintāvatetyādinā // @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:5523: kiṃ ca samavāyābhedavādinaḥ tavāpi mate gotvādisamavāyasyāśvādāvapi satvādādhārādheyatvamātrasya
GSP29vytrkt2u:5524: 1 sarvādhāre kālādāvapi satvātsvarūpasambandharūpaviśaṣaṇatā viśeṣa eva gaurityādidhīniyāmaka ita vācyam / @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:5525: samūhālambanajñānasthale ghaṭapaṭādisaṃnikarṣāṇāmanyānyatvaṃ spaṣṭamityupetya rūpītyādijñāne tadvyanakti -- ghaṭeti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:5527: idaṃ ca saṃbandhanānātvaṃ sāmānyapratyāsattipakṣe 'pi samavetyāha -- kiṃ ceti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:5528: purovartiniṣṭhasya gotvasyātītādivyaktibhiḥ samavāya ādhārādheyabhāvo vā jātau vyaktervyāvartakatayā viśeṣaṇatvena svaviśeṣaṇatvarūpo vā saṃbandho vācyaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5530: eka eva samavāyo na tu saṃyogavannāneti pakṣe sarvavyaktibhirjātereka eva saṃbandha iti yugapatsarvopasthitiḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5535: tathā ca gotvena deśakālayorapyupasthitiḥ syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5539: nanu - pratiyogināmupasthitāveva pratiyogibhāvarūpasambandhajñānaṃ saṃbandhajñāne ca pratiyogināmupasthitiriti pratiyogināṃ jñāne pratiyogināṃ jñānaṃ kāraṇamityāpannam, @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:5544: sa ca saṃbandhaḥ svarūpasanneva pratyāsattir 1 na tu jñāta ityātmāśrayaparihāropyāvayoḥ samānaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt2u:5545: nanu purovartigovyaktau manmate gotvamiva tvanmate tasyāḥ svagatasādṛśyapratiyogitvaṃ neti kathaṃ tasmādupasthitiri cenna /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5550: anyathā tavāpyayaṃ doṣaḥ syāditi bhāvenāha -- sa ceti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:5553: gotvasya purovartivyaktyāpratītādivyaktibhiśca viśeṣaṇatārūpa eva saṃbandha iti yuktam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5554: tatra gotvaṃ purovartinaḥ yena rupeṇa saṃbaddhaṃ 3 tenaiva rūpeṇātītādibhirapi saṃbaddha 4 miti purovartivyaktamatītādivyaktiṃ yugapadupasthāpayatīti,
GSP29vytrkt2u:5555: sādṛśyaṃ tu purovartinā dharmitvena saṃbandhamatītādibhiḥ pratiyogitveneti vairūpātkathaṃ yugapatsarvamupasthāpayediti bhāvena śaṅkate -- nanviti
GSP29vytrkt2u:5566: api ca-- trivakrama ekena pādenordhvalokamanyenādharalokamiva sādṛśyaṃ
GSP29vytrkt2u:5572: tattāṃśa eva cakṣuṣaḥ saṃskārasya jñānasya vā pratyāsattitvenedamaṃśe saṃyogādereva
GSP29vytrkt2u:5576: nanvathāpyekarūpasaṃbandho na labhyata ityata āha -- api ceti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:5587: sahakārisāmarthyena karaṇānāṃśaktyantarāvirbhāvasya bahulamupalambhāditi vākyamarthato niṣkṛṣyāha -- paddhatāvityādinā //
GSP29vytrkt2u:5591: na hi nyāyamate 'pyanugatajātau saṃskāre vyavasāye yogajadharme bhrāntihetau doṣe ca mukhyaṃ pratyāsattitvamasti /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5596: kuta evaṃ sāmānyapratyāsattirevopeyatāmityata āha -- na hīti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:5614: na ca śaktigraha eva sādṛśyamupadhānamityuktam na tu vyāptigraha iti vācyam / @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:5617: nanu tathāpi gavayopi gosādṛśyapratiyogīti tasyāpyupasthitiḥ syāditi cettavāpyupamitau gausadṛśapaśvāntarasya gavayaśabdavācyatādhīḥ syāt /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5618: ayaṃ gaurityupadeśe 1 ca gogatadravyatvādijātyantarasya dhīḥ syāt //
GSP29vytrkt2u:5622: ca vācyaṃ gosādṛśyamaśvepyastīti tatrāpi gośabdavācyatānumānaprasaṅga“ityādinā sudhoktātiprasaṅgottare
GSP29vytrkt2u:5626: gosadṛśo gavaya ityatideśavākyaṃ śrutavato vanaṃ gatasya gausādṛśyaviśiṣṭapiṇḍadarśanāttasmin piṇḍe
GSP29vytrkt2u:5627: gavayaśabdavācyatvaviṣayakopamitirjāyata iti mate gosadṛśe gavayabhinne paśvantare yatkiñcidgosādṛśyaviśiṣṭadarśanena tasmin gavayaśabdavācyatvopamitiḥ yojanā /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5629: purasthite gopiṇḍe gaurityupadeśe gotvāvacchedena gośabdavācyatvaṃ gṛhṇāti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:5631: kiṃ tu gotvādivyāpakabahiraṅgadravyatvaṃ pṛthivītvādinaiva vācya 3 dhīḥ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5635: yatkiñcitsadṛśo mahiṣyādau gavayapadapyutpattigrahe sati mahiṇamānayetyādivyāvahāre gavayapadasyodvāpo mahiṣapadasyāvāposti sa na syāt / @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:5643: nāpi śakti 2 vyaptyādigraho na saṃbhavatīti dvitīyaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5644: tvanmata eka 3 jātyeva manmatepyuktarītyā sarvavyaktisambandhinaikena sādṛśyena kroḍīkṛtāsu vyaktiṣu śaktivyāptyādigrahasaṃbhavāt // @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:5645: tathā gavayānayanādau gavayamānayetyucyate tatra gavayapadasyāvāposti padāntarasyodvāpaḥ sa na syāt /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5647: ayamityādyupadeśe 'pi ghaṭādyānayane gāmānayetyādiprayo 4 gādarśanādantaraṅgaṃ gotvamevāvacchedakaṃ gṛhṇātīti yadyucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5655: 1.givyāvṛttatvenā -naṃ.ja. 2.ktigraho-naṃ.ja.ga. ktivyāptigra -rā.su. 3.kayā jā - rā.su.ga. 4.ga da -naṃ.e. 5.'saṃbandhinā' iti nāsti -u.naṃ.
GSP29vytrkt2u:5661: evaṃ tvanmate gotvaṃ śaktigrahe viśeṣaṇatvācchābdajñāne viṣayatvena praviśati /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5662: manmate tu sādṛśyaṃ pratyasattimātratvānna tatra praviśatīti gośabdādgosadṛśa iti dhīrna bhavatīti /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5663: guṇa eva cājñātakaraṇe pratyāsatterajñā 1 tāyā eva pratyāsattitvāt svasādhyajñāne viṣayatvenānanupraveśaśca /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5665: nanvevaṃ jāteriva sādṛśyasyāpi śābdadhīvaṣayatvaprasaṅgena gośabdādgosadṛśa iti dhīḥ syādītyata āha -- iyāṃstviti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:5673: jñātakaraṇe tathātve 'pyajñātakaraṇapratyakṣe 'jñātasyaiva tadyuktamityāha -- guṇa eva ceti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:5675: nanvalaukikasannikarṣe jñātasyaiva pratyāsattitvamiti niyama iti cenna /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5681: gotvaprakārikopasthitirneti śābdabodho 'pi gotvaprakārako na syāditi śaṅkyam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5682: tvanmate 1 tādṛśyā api pratyāsatteḥ svaprakārakadhījanakatvasvabhāvasyaiva manmate
GSP29vytrkt2u:5684: yadvā taveva mamāpi purovartigovartigotvaṃ jñātameva pratyāsattiḥ / @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:5687: gopadādgosadṛśa iti dhīḥ syāditi doṣābhāvepi gotvaviśiṣṭagodhīrna syādityāśaṅkya nirāha -- na caivamiti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:5711: tete vyāvṛttākārāḥ taistair 1 dravyaguṇa kārmasāmānyairnimittaiḥ tattacchabdavācyā iti sudhāyāmityarthaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt2u:5714: daṇḍyantaraguṇyantarādipadārthāḥ daṇḍī guṇī śakla ityādiśabdavācyatayā grāhyā iti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:5715: nanvasmin pakṣe - sudhāvākye sāmānyairnimittairityeva vācyam tāvatāpi muṇḍitagovyaktidhīrgopadātsyāditi prastutadoṣaparihārāt dravyaguṇakarmetyuktirvyarthetyata āha -- aneneti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:5719: daṇḍī śuklaḥ paṭaścalati gauriti daṇḍi 1 śuklacala ityādiśabdapravṛttinimittānāmityarthaḥ / @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:5725: na hi pituḥ pāṇḍityena putraḥ paṇḍito bhavatīti sucitam //
GSP29vytrkt2u:5727: ca gotvā 1 dīnāṃ vyaktivadanekatvenaikasya śaktigrahaviṣayatā 2 niyāmakasyābhāvādaniyamaḥ syāditi cenna /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5742: sudhāyāṃ ca“na hi sādṛśyaṃ śabdaśaktiviṣayatayā pravṛttinimittatayā vābhyupagamyate“ityukteriti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5744: 1.ādipadaṃ na -naṃ. ja. ga. rā. su. 2.yani -naṃ. ja. ga. rā. su. 3.pravṛttītyadhikam -e. 4. viśeṣāvagatītyapi pradarśitam - e. @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:5760: ekasyāniyāmakatve kathaṃ śakyatvaṃ niyataṃ syādityata āha -- na hīti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:5770: atra ca yogyatvavācinā prāptita ityanena gāmānayetyetyādāvānayanādya 2 yogyānāmatītānāgataviprakṛṣṭānām,
GSP29vytrkt2u:5779: iti pūrvakṛtavyutpādanarītyā spaṣṭaṃ pratīyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5784: svarūpasa 5 dyatsādṛśyaṃ purovartigotvaniṣṭhaṃ sādṛśyaṃ tadupasthitāni yāni paraspara 6 sādṛśyāni gotvāni tadavacchinnagovyaktiṣvityarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5797: prācīnapakṣasyāpyupasaṃhārapakṣe tu purovartivyāktiniṣṭhasādṛśyopasathāpitāḥ parasparasadṛśaḥ yā nānāvyaktayaḥ parasparasadṛśanānāgotvairavacchinnāstāsvityarthaḥ
GSP29vytrkt2u:5802: nanu padaśaktivāde sudhāsammatyā jātyāderapi nimittatayā śakyatvoktiḥ paddhativākyaviruddhetyata āha -- atraivakāraṇeti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:5807: na hi sādṛśyaṃ śabdaśaktiviṣayatayā pravṛttinimittayā vābhyupagamyata iti sudhānurodhenārthamāha -- atropadhāmityuktyeti // @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:5814: yadvā yathā prābhākaramate dhenuśabdasya jñātena gotvenopahite dhānakarmaṇi śaktigraho
GSP29vytrkt2u:5815: yathā ca nyāyamata ekaviṃśatiprabhedabhinnānāṃ dukhānāṃ madhye caramasya mukhyaduḥkhasya
GSP29vytrkt2u:5816: janyatvāditareṣāṃ ca śarīrādīnāṃ gauṇaduḥkhānāṃ janakatvādubhayanirūpya 1 tayā jñātaṃ
GSP29vytrkt2u:5819: sādṛśyaṃ tu vyāvṛttamapi tattacchabdavācyatvabodhe liṅgatayopayujyata ityādisudhoktyanurodhena pakṣāntaraṃ tathetyādinā vaktaṃ dṛṣṭāntatrayamāha -- yadvā yatheti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:5821: gheṭ pāna iti dhātordhānaṃ pānaṃ tatprati karmakārakabhūta ityarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5822: vatsena goḥ payimānatvāddheṭaḥ karmaṇi 2 lyuṭpratyayavidhānāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5823: tarhi mihiṣyādāvapi dhenuśabdaprayogāpattirityāśaṅkya 3 gotvasya prayogopādhitvopagamāditi bhāvenoktaṃ -- gotvenopahite iti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:5836: yathā ca vaktuniṣṭāṃ devadattādiviṣayāṃ jñātāmekāṃ buddhimupadhānīkṛtya vaktṛniṣṭhabuddhiviṣayeṣu
GSP29vytrkt2u:5839: uktaṃ hi bādhanālakṣaṇaṃ duḥkhamiti nyāyasūtratatvabodhe vardhamānena duḥkhasabandhanirūpakatvaṃ duḥkhatvamiti // @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:5842: te gatā āgatā ityādivyāvahārārthaṃ hi tacchabdasya śaktigrahaḥ,
GSP29vytrkt2u:5862: na ca sarvanāmni vaktṛgatabu 1 ddherivātītādijñānātprāktanpratiyogikasādṛśyajñānaṃ na saṃbhavatīti vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5863: bhūyo vyavavahārādidarśanadaśāyāṃ pratiyogibhūta 2 vartamānapiṇḍāntarasya jñātatvena tatsaṃbhavāt /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5871: buddheryathā jñānaṃ saṃbhavati na tathā sādṛśyajñānaṃ saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5877: nanu tatpratiyogikatvenājñāne satyetatsādṛśyapratiyoginaḥ sarve gopadavācyā iti jñānaṃ kathamityata āha -- yadveti // ukteti // @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:5884: atropadhānamityuktyā sādṛśyaṃ sarvanāmni tatpade vaktṛgatabuddhiriva jñānamapyupalakṣaṇatvānna śaktigrahaviṣa iti sūcitam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5885: atra ca sādṛśyaṃ svarūpasade 2 vopasthāpakamitimate tadupasthāpitaiḥ 3 parasparaṃ sadṛśairanekairgotvaiḥ 4 śaktigrahaniyamaḥ,
GSP29vytrkt2u:5886: purovartipiṇḍagataṃ jñātaṃ gotvamupasthāpakiti mate tadupasthāpitaiḥ tatsadṛśairanekairgotvaistanniyamaḥ,
GSP29vytrkt2u:5892: sarvādīni sarvanāmānītyanena sarvanāmasaṃjñake ta 8 ditipade vaktṛgatabuddhisthasya viṣayatve 'pi na buddhirviṣayo yathā tathā sādṛśyamapi na śaktiviṣayatayā gṛhyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5899: 1.nāva -rā.su. 2.vajñātaṃ vo-naṃ.rā.su. cājñātaṃ vo- ga. 3.taiḥ satsaha-naṃ tatsa
GSP29vytrkt2u:5906: evaṃ ca taveva mamāpimate dhūmajātīyasya vahnijātīyarāhite 'vṛttirdhūmasyavahnivyāptiḥ,
GSP29vytrkt2u:5911: tava sājātyamekajātyāśrayatvaṃ mama tu sājātyamekajātisadṛśajātyāśrayatvaṃ vā,
GSP29vytrkt2u:5912: ekasyā eva vyaktervyaktnyariṣṭhasādṛśya 2 pratiyogatvarūpo vyaktyantarasaṃbandho vā,
GSP29vytrkt2u:5914: evamanugata jāterabhāvepi sarvatra śaktigrahaṃ sādṛśyenaivopapādyadānīyamevaṃ sarvadhūmāgnisaṃgrāhakayorityādinā pūrvamākṣiptaṃ vyāptigrahādikaṃ ca samādhatte-- evaṃ ceti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:5916: jātīyatvaṃ ca paramate tadbhinnatve sati tanniṣṭhajātimatvam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5917: siddhānte tu tadabhāvātkathaṃ taveva mamāpītyuktirityata āha -- iyāṃstu bheda iti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:5933: ekadhīviṣayatvājñāne 'pi sājātyajñānātprāguktameva sājātyaṃ yuktamityatra pakṣe 'rucibījaṃ dhyeyam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5940: tathā dharmipratiyogitayā sarvagovyaktisaṃbandhaṃ sādṛśyaṃ jñātameva sarvagovyaktyupasthāpakamiti;
GSP29vytrkt2u:5942: jñātaṃ satsvayamupalakṣaṇībhūya nānāgotvāvacchinnaṃ sarvagovyaktiṣu śaktigrāhakamiti ca;
GSP29vytrkt2u:5948: 1.jīvanaṃ -naṃ. vopajīvanaṃ -rā. su. 2.kaṃ na gotva -naṃ. kaṃ nānyonyatvaviśi -e. 3. vanamiti - naṃ. @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:5952: pṛthivītvasya dravyajātīyasaṃbandhitve sati kiñcidravyajātīyāvādyasaṃbandhitvarūpaṃ viśeṣatvaṃ ca yuktamita,
GSP29vytrkt2u:5954: kiṃ tu dravyatvasya sarvapṛthivyādinā saṃbandhastava samavāyaḥ mama tūktarītyā 1 pṛthivyādipratiyogikasādṛśyaṃ 2 prati prayojakatvam,
GSP29vytrkt2u:5955: evaṃ pṛthivītvasya kiñcidra 3 vyāsaṃbandhastāvāvādyasamavāyo mama tvavādipratiyogikasādṛśyā 4 prayojakatvamiti
GSP29vytrkt2u:5960: agniṣomīyaṃ paśumālabheta“ityādau utsargāpavādanyāyabhaṅgo 'pi netyapi samāhitaṃ bodhyam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5961: kathaṃ tarhyanugatajātipakṣādbheda iti pṛcchati -- kiṃ tviti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:5974: nānārtha iti vyavasthā pūpasthāpitānāṃ pravṛttinimittānāṃ sādṛśyavaisādṛśyābhyāṃ vā upasthāpakānāṃ sādṛśyānāṃ jātīnāṃ sādṛśyavesādṛśyābhyāṃ vā yuktā/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5981: sādṛśyaṃ vā gotvādīkaṃ vā tīrādipadārthopasthāpaka mitipūrvoktamatadvayānurodhenāha -- sādṛśyānāṃ jātīnāṃ veti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:5987: dharmiṇi eva ghaṭādidharmatvavanmṛdghaṭayoḥ samavāya ityatra saṃbandhitvena pratītasyāpi
GSP29vytrkt2u:5988: samavāyasya mṛdghaṭābhyāṃ svasya ca viśiṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvena jāyamānaviśiṣṭapratyayaṃ
GSP29vytrkt2u:5990: 2 ghaṭabhedasya ca ghaṭena bhede satyanavasthā'patyā svasya svenaiva tadbhinnasya
GSP29vytrkt2u:5992: prameyatvādāvapi prameyatvāntaraṃ samavāye samavāyāntaraṃ bheda bhedāntaramiti tatrāpyanavasthā syādeveti bhāvaḥ / @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:5996: -- dharmitvavatsaṃbandhina eva saṃbandhatvavadbhinnasyaiva bhedatvavacca sadṛśasyaiva sādṛśyatvopapatteḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5997: na ca sāmānyānyeveti nyāyena jātireva sādṛśyam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:6001: nanvathāpi jātānāṃ sādṛśyavaisādṛśyabhyāmityayuktamiti bhāvena śaṅkate -- na ceti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:6005: na ca sāmānyaṃ pratiyoginirūpaṃ tannirūpyaṃ ca sādṛśyamiti sphuṭamanayorbheda iti sudhoktamāha -- sapratiyogikatvāditi //
GSP29vytrkt2u:6007: ayamanenātyantasādṛśaḥ ayaṃ ca kiṃ citsadṛśa iti pratīteriva satvānna jātireva sādṛśyamityarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:6009: titvanityatvādinā sadṛśa ityādi vyavahāra iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:6013: sudhāvirodhamāśaṅkya tatspaṣṭaṃ niṣkṛṣyānuvadan pakṣāntaratvena samādhimāha -- sudhāyāṃ tviti // @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:6017: tasya 1 cāyaṃ caitatsadṛśāśca sarve gośabdavācyā ityevaṃ paratvādavagatavyāptiśca piṇḍāntaraṃ dṛṣṭvānumimīte ayaṃ dośabdavācyaḥ tatsadṛśatvāditi
GSP29vytrkt2u:6021: tathā ca pṛthivyāḥ pṛthivāśabdavācyatve gandhavatvamiva gorgośabdavācyatve 'nuvyākhyānoktaṃ sādṛśyaṃ liṅgamiti pakṣāntaramuktam //
GSP29vytrkt2u:6022: ata eva paddhatau --“vartamānasannikṛṣṭamātragrāhipratyakṣaṃ kathamatītādyāspadāṃ vyāptiṃ gṛhṇīyāditi cenna /
GSP29vytrkt2u:6023: sahakārisāmarthyena kāraṇānāṃ śaktyantarāvirbhāvasya bahulamupalambhā“dityanenāsmaduktaṃ pakṣamuktvā kiṃ ca pratītasya dhūmasyāgninā saṃbandhe svābhāvikatayā -- @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:6025: tarhi svoktapakṣe kiṃ jñāpakamityata āha -- ata eveti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:6028: pakṣāntaramuktamityanena paddhativākyayoḥ parasparaṃ sudhāvākyena ca virodhaḥ parihṛto jñeyaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt2u:6034: -- niścite yadyantatrāpi dhūmaḥ syāttarhi tasyāpye 1 vamityevaṃ vyāptigraho bhavatītya nena sudhoktaṃ pakṣāntaramuktam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:6040: granthantare vyāptigrahe sākṣyuktiśca sāmānyena sākṣijñānasyāpi satvāt / @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:6043: iti bhaktipādīyānuvyākhyānaślokavyākhyānasudhāyāmatītānāgatavartamānaṃ sarvamapi liṅgapadena sādhyena vyāptamitijñānapekṣaṃ khalvanumānam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:6044: na caitajjñānaṃ 3 sākṣiṇā vinā saṃbhavatītyādinā vyāptigrahe sākṣiṇa evopāyatvokteḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:6059: sudhāyām“pyetena kāryakāraṇabhāvādhāraṇādikamapi samāhitami“tyanena vākyena śaktigrahe uktasya prakārasya vyāptyādigrahe 'tideśācca //
GSP29vytrkt2u:6066: yadyapi tatrātītānāgātapadārtheṣu sāmānyākāreṇa sākṣipratīteṣu padānāṃ vācakatvaśaktirgṛhītetyeva pāṭhāt sā 1 kṣyevātītādyupa 2 sthiteriti bhāti
GSP29vytrkt2u:6069: ata eva tatrāpi sāmānyākāreṇetyuktirita bhāvena sāmānyākāreṇa sākṣipratīteṣvatyaṃśaprahāṇenāvaśiṣṭavākyodāharaṇamityadoṣaḥ // @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:6079: nanu - sudhāyāmatīte luḍantasyānāgate ḷḍantasya śaktigrahoktiparatvenaivātītetiśloko vyākhyātaḥ,
GSP29vytrkt2u:6080: na sarvaśabdaśaktigrahoktiparatvenā ataḥ kathaṃ tatsaṃmatirucyata ityata āha -- yatviti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:6083: ādyapakṣe tu sannyāyaratnāvalyuktadiśā bhavatyevoktārthe saṃmatiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:6084: kimarthamevaṃ tatra sudhāyāṃ vyākhyātamityata āha -- gavādīti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:6090: kiṃ ca tvanmate 'pi ghaṭatvādajātiḥ pṛthivītvādivyāpyā nānaiva /
GSP29vytrkt2u:6091: tāratvādijātirapi katvā 1 dijātyā caitrajatvajātyā saṅkarāpatyā gatvādivyāpyā nānaiva /
GSP29vytrkt2u:6094: parammatyāpyananugadharmeṇa śaktigrahamupapādayutumupoddhātamāha -- kiṃ ca tvanmata iti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:6098: iha ca tejastejastvasya mṛdghaṭe sato ghaṭatvasya ghaṭatvaparihāreṇālokādau satastejastvasya
GSP29vytrkt2u:6099: svarṇaghaṭe samāveśātsvarṇasya ca paramate tejastvādataḥ sāṅkaryadoṣanirāsāya nānaivopeyā /
GSP29vytrkt2u:6100: tathā ca tejastvādivyāpyasya ghaṭatvasya tejastvādiparihāreṇānyatrāvartamānatvānna sāṅkyaryam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:6104: tāratvacaitrajanyatāvacchedakajātyoḥ maitrīyatārakakāre caitrakṛtakaṭādau ca satoścaitrajanyatārakakāre samāveśātsāṅkaryaṃ syāttannirāsāya nānaiva vācyā /
GSP29vytrkt2u:6105: evamudbhūtatvānīlatvayoḥ śuklarūpānudbhūtanīlarūpayoḥ satorudbhūtanīlarūpe ghaṭādiniṣṭhe samāveśena sāṅkaryanirāsāya nānaiva vācyetyarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:6109: evaṃ ca yathā -- tatra ghaṭatvādīnāṃ nānātve 'pi ghaṭādiśabdavyutpattiḥ,
GSP29vytrkt2u:6113: tathā gotvānāṃ nānātve 'pi vyutpatyādikaṃ kiṃ na syāt /.
GSP29vytrkt2u:6114: na ca ghaṭatvaṃ saṃsthanarūpāvayavasaṃyogavṛttīti na saṅkara iti vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:6119: evaṃ na ghaṭatvabahutvābhāvānna doṣa iti cenna /

GSP29vytrkt2u:6142: yadapi tāratvaṃ nāneti tārādiśabdapyutpatyādirna syādityādipadaprayogenābhimataṃ 2 tatrānugatimāśaṅkyāha -- yadi ceti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:6147: nanu sādṛśyānyapi nānāsaṃbandhitvānyapi tathaiva śabdānugamamātrasyātiprasañjakatvāditi bhāvenāha -- api ceti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:6161: tarhihāpi sādṛśyadvāra 1 kaparamparāsaṃbandhenaikamātravṛttigotvaṃ vā nānāvyaktisaṃbandhi sādṛśyaṃ vā yacchabde vaktṛniṣṭhabuddhiriva gomātrānugatamastu
GSP29vytrkt2u:6169: vaktṛniṣṭhabuddhirvaktṛbuddhiviṣayānekārtheṣu svasaṃbandhitvena sarvānugatā satī sarvanāmasaṃjñakatatpadasya vyutpattau nimittaṃ bhavati //
GSP29vytrkt2u:6176: na hi sākṣātsaṃbandhena dharmeṇānugame vyāvṛttaikasvabhāvahānirna tu
GSP29vytrkt2u:6179: kiṃ ca tvatpakṣe jātivadākṛterapi pravṛttinimitta 2 tvādākṛtirapyanugataivāstu //

GSP29vytrkt2u:6185: māstu tatrānugato dharmaḥ kiṃ tata ityata āha -- tasmāditi //

GSP29vytrkt2u:6192: 1.tyanyatrā - naṃ ga. rā. su. 2.vajjātirapyananugatai - naṃ. ga. rā. sur. 3.thāṃ -naṃ.e. 4.grahasyavya -naṃ. u. @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:6198: 1 nilamutpannaṃ nilaṃ niṣṭamitivadghaṭa utpanno 2 ghaṭo naṣṭa ityanubhavātpratyakṣā 3 deva jātyutpattivināśau // @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:6209: śrutyā ca jāternityatvādikamapākurvannādau tāvadviśiṣṭapratyakṣeṇa jāteranityatvamāha -- kiṃ cetyādinā //
GSP29vytrkt2u:6213: 1.nīlamutpannamiti nāsti - naṃ.ja. 2.paṭa utpannaḥ ghaṭo naṣṭaḥ paṭo naṣṭaḥ -ga. 3.veva-naṃ.ja.rā.su. 4.tyayena -naṃ.u. 5.lamutpannami -u.e.
GSP29vytrkt2u:6215: na ca viśiṣṭotpatyā 1 diviṣayeyaṃ dhītirviśeṣyavyaktimātrotpatyādināpi yukteti vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:6218: kiṃ ca yathā dravye pākena nīlaraktarūpayornāśotpādau tathā dravye satyevauṣadhādinā tāmratvarajatatvayorapi tau dṛśyete / @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:6221: tathā cāna 2 nyathāsiddhostviti śaṅkate -- na ceti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:6228: viśeṣyaṃ nābhigacchet kṣīṇaśaktirviśiṣeṇe iti nyāyāditi bhāvenoktam -- suvacatvāditi //
GSP29vytrkt2u:6233: nanu satyeva dravye nīlādiguṇasya nivṛttidarśanānna tatra tathātvāpāto yukta ityata āha -- kiṃ ceti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:6237: dvitīyepi kiṃ vyaktināśasthalīyajātyanubhavo vā bādhaka uta vyaktyantare tadanubhavo vā / @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:6241: na ca puruṣe naṣṭe 'pi daṇḍavavdyaktau naṣṭāyāmapi tatraiva pradeśe jātiranubhūyate /
GSP29vytrkt2u:6248: ayaṃ gorayamapi ca gauriti dhīstvayaṃ sthūlo 'yamapi ca sthūla iti dhīvatsādṛśyaviṣayā //
GSP29vytrkt2u:6252: nanu -- vyaktināśapraveśe jāteḥ satvepi vyañjakābhāvādananubhavostvityata āha -- vyañjaketi //
GSP29vytrkt2u:6254: nirbījam / jātau tu naivamityata āhaḥ-- na cādyāpīti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:6255: nanu 1 -- pratyabhijñayā anugatamatyā vā jāternityatvaṃ siddhamityataḥ pratyabhijñānasya svarūpataḥ pramāṇatvena na saṃdigdhatvādityāsudhoktaṃ vyañjayannāha -- tadevedamiva //
GSP29vytrkt2u:6258: yadvā jāteranityatve pratyakṣamuktvā adhunā vimataṃ vināśavat vināśavadāśrayasamavetatvādrūpādivadityādisudhoktayuktīmāha -- kiñcetyādinā asmanmatāpattirityantena granthena //
GSP29vytrkt2u:6264: api ca jāterdvitvādivadyvyāsajyajvṛttitve tadvadeva yāvatsvāśrayapratītiṃ vināpratītiḥ syāt /
GSP29vytrkt2u:6265: agnimātroddeśena dravyatyāge 'gnīṣomīyaśāstrārtha ivaikagovyaktidāne gāṃ dadyādiśāstrārtho 'nanuṣṭhitaśca syāt / @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:6266: nanvanugatvameva jāteranityatve bādhakamato naṣṭo ghaṭa ityādibuddhervyaktiviṣayatvameva yuktamityataḥ“yo 'nekāśrito dharmo nāsāvekaikapratītau pratīyate yathā dvitvādiḥ/
