GSP29vytrkt2u:6804: kiṃ tu svarūpaṃ sadicchāviṣayatvaṃ prati prayojakaṃ sukhaduḥkhābhāvānyataratvameveti jñeyam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:6811: aśakye takṣakacūḍāmaṇyāharaṇādau tātkālikeṣṭasādhane viṣasaṃpṛktamadhubhakṣaṇe niṣiddhakarmaṇi ca pravṛttiprasaṅgāt /
GSP29vytrkt2u:6812: kiṃ tu kṛtisādhyatve sati balavadaniṣṭānanubandhitvena vā iṣṭotpattinānantarīyakaduḥkhādhikaduḥkhājanakatvena vā- @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:6814: atreti // iṣṭasādhanatvameva viṅagādyartha iti prameyaviṣaye viśiṣṭameveṣṭasādhanatvaṃ vidhipratyārtha ityuktamiti vakṣyamāṇenānvayaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:6818: yadyapi maṇāviṣṭotpattināntarīyaketyādi dvitīyakalpa eva kaṇṭhoktastathāpi śyenādau
GSP29vytrkt2u:6830: dvitīyena tu viṣasaṃpṛktamadhubhakṣaṇe niṣiddhe ca na pravṛttiḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:6831: bhojanādinā tṛptyādirūpeṣṭotpattau satyāṃ yannāntarīyakaṃ duḥkhaṃ śramādi tadadhikanarakādiduḥkhājanatveneti dvitīyapakṣasyārthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:6834: anugatasya tasyābhāvāditi maṇikṛduktameva doṣaṃ dvitīyapakṣe pakṣadharādyuktaṃ doṣamarucibījaṃ darśayati -- yadyapīti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:6835: iṣṭāpekṣayā aniṣṭasyādhikatvaṃ balavatvamityādirūpeṇa kathaṃ cidanugateḥ iṣṭotpattināntarīyakaduḥkhādhikaduḥthajanakatvaṃ prasiddham /
GSP29vytrkt2u:6850: na ca naño vidhyarthaikadeśena viśeṣaṇenānvaye ekaśabdārthasyāparaśabdārthaikadeśenānvaya 2 vyutpattivirodha iti vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:6852: putreṇa caitraputrasya putra ityevamanvayasya ca darśanāt //
GSP29vytrkt2u:6853: kiṃ ca -- kumudaṃ śvetameva pārtha eva dhanurdharo 5 nīlaṃ sarojaṃ bhavetyevetyatra viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyakriyā 6 nvitā nāmavadhāraṇānāṃ
GSP29vytrkt2u:6859: pakṣadharādyuktaśaṅkottare vyanakti-- na ca naña iti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:6865: anyonyābhāvavati lākṣiṇikatvena padārthaikadeśenānyonyābhāvena 1 ghaṭasya pratiyogitvenānvayo dṛśyate / tathā 2
GSP29vytrkt2u:6867: api ca -- na kalañjaṃ bhakṣayedityādau nañarthasya vidhyarthena viśiṣṭenānvayepi śābdena viśiṣṭābhāvena viśeṣyasatvajñānasahakṛtena viśeṣaṇābhāvasyānumānāt
GSP29vytrkt2u:6870: tathā ca niṣedhasya na vidhyarthaikadeśenānvaya ityāhuḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:6883: viśiṣṭasya liṅagādyarthatvakalpane kiṃ yāgādau pravṛtyarthamuta niṣedhopapatyarthaṃ yadvā bādhakadaśāyāmapi viṣayasaṃpṛktamadhubhakṣaṇadāvapravṛtyartham
GSP29vytrkt2u:6896: nāpi saṃjātabādhasya viṣasaṃpṛktamadhubhakṣaṇādau niṣiddhe kalañjabhakṣaṇādau cāpravṛtyartham /
GSP29vytrkt2u:6902: svamatena parihāradvayasya“kecittu anye tvi“tyābhyāṃ ca parihāradvayasyokteriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:6906: iṣṭopāyatvamātrasya pravartakatvepi tasya tatrāpi satvena pravṛtyāpatteriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:6907: pravartakatvenābhimatamiṣṭopāyatvaṃ tatra nāstīti vaktuṃ prasaktakalpadvayanirāsapūrvamupodghātamāha -- pravartakatvenetyādinā pravṛttiparatvāhānerityantena
GSP29vytrkt2u:6914: kiṃ tu svargo me 'stvitīcchāprakārībhūtasvargatvaviśiṣṭaṃ prati sādhanatvena jñānam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:6919: iṣṭasādhanamiti jñānaṃ sveṣṭāsadhanamiti jñānamiti pakṣadvaye 'pīcchāyā jñānaviṣayatayānupraveśāt /
GSP29vytrkt2u:6920: tasyāśca svarūpasatyā eva pravartakatvānna kalpadvayamapi yuktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:6922: svarūpasadicchāyāḥ prakārībhūtaṃ 4 svargaviśeṣaṇatayā viṣayībhūtaṃ yatsvargatvaṃ tadviśiṣṭaṃ pratītyarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:6923: asmin pakṣe bādhakamāśaṅkya nirāha -- na caivamiti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:6929: 1.pareṣṭa ityādi nāsti -naṃ.ja.ka. 2.najñā-ja.ka. 3.tadapi-naṃ. ja.ka.rā.su. ekāraḥ pūritaḥ -ca. 4. tasva -e.naṃ. @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:6932: uktāyāmicchāyāṃ svarūpeṇa satyāmidaṃ svargasādhanamiti jñānenaiva pravṛtterdarśanāt /
GSP29vytrkt2u:6933: na hi phalarāge idaṃ phalasādhanamiti jñāna ca sati aniṣṭānanubandhitvājñānena 1 pravṛttivilambaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:6934: 2 kriyāṃ 3 phalasādhanatayāvagamya phalarāge sati tāṃ cikīrṣatyanantaraṃ karotīti hi sthitiḥ //
GSP29vytrkt2u:6935: na caivaṃ yatpravartakamiṣṭaviśeṣasādhanatvena jñānaṃ tanna vidhipratyayajanyam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:6936: yacca vidhipratyayajanyamiṣṭasādhanatvena jñānaṃ tanna pravartakamiti kathaṃ vidhipratyayasya pravṛttiparatvamiti vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:6937: vidhipratyayeneṣṭasādhanamityeva bodhite 'pi svargakāmo yajeteti vākyajanyasya svargasādhanamiti jñānasya pravartakatvena vidhipratyayasya pravṛttiparatvāhāneḥ
GSP29vytrkt2u:6940: nanvevaṃ maṇyuktaviśeṣaṇajñānamapyastu pravartakamityata āha -- na hīti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:6952: evaṃ ca viṣasaṃpṛktamadhubhojanādiphale duḥkhe utkaṭadveṣadaśāyāṃ tatphale sukhe icchaiva 1 neti na tatra pravṛttiḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:6954: anyathā sādhane balavadaniṣṭānubandhitve jñātepi sukhasādhanatvaprayuktecchā syāt / @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:6955: - svarga 2 yāgiśabdāntarasamabhivyāhāreṇa viśeṣa eva paryavasānānna pravṛttiparatvabhaṅga ityarthaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt2u:6956: evamupodghātamuktvā kalañjabhakṣaṇādāvapratyarthaṃ vidhipratyayasya viśiṣṭārthatvakalpanamapi netyetadupapādayati -- evaṃ
GSP29vytrkt2u:6958: tathā ca tatreṣṭasādhanatvajñānameva neti kāraṇābhāvānna pravṛttirityarthaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt2u:6959: nanvaivaṃ viṣasaṃpṛktamadhubhojanādiphale sukhatvasyāpi bhāvāt sukhatvaprayuktecchāyā pravṛttirapi āha -- sukhatveti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:6962: utkaṭatvaṃ ca jātirvā kaściddharmo veti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:6966: tathā ca tatprayukteṣṭasādhanatvajñānanimittā pravṛttirapi syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:6973: pravṛttāvavaśyāpekṣitāyāḥ phalecchāyā abhāvenaiva siddheriṣṭāsādhanatvaṃ tredhā na viśeṣaṇīyam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:6974: uktāyāṃ phalecchāyāmasatyāṃ tvaduktaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭasvargasādhanatvajñāne satyapyalasasyānyatrāsaktasya ca puruṣasya yāgādau pravṛtyadarśanenānvayavyabhicārāt
GSP29vytrkt2u:6977: balavadaniṣṭānubandhitvā 1 dijñāne satyapi niṣiddhakarmajanye duḥkhe utkaṭadveṣarūpāpavādakābhāvadaśāyāṃ tajjanyasukhaviṣayakarāgautkaṭyena niṣiddhakarmaṇi pravṛttidarśanena
GSP29vytrkt2u:6988: atrāpyanyaprayuktatvaṃ vyabhicārasyāśaṅkya nirāha -- na ca sādhana iti // @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:6993: kiñca viśiṣṭamiṣṭasādhanatvaṃ vidhyarthaścecchayenenābhicaranyajetetyatra 1 vidhipratyayasya viśeṣyamātre lākṣaṇikatvaṃ syāt //
GSP29vytrkt2u:6994: paroktaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭeṣṭasādhanatvaṃ liṅgadyartha ityatra kalpakaṃ nāstītyupapādya bādhakaṃ cāstītyāha -- kiṃ ca viśiṣṭamiti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:7001: iṣṭasādhanatvasyaiva vidhipratyayārthatve tu na doṣa iti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt2u:7002: nanu - gordravyaṃ ghaṭo 'nitya ityādau viśeṣyamātrepyanvayadarśanena viśeśeṣyamātropasthitau na lakṣaṇā /
GSP29vytrkt2u:7003: viśeṣyabādhena viśeṣaṇamātrānvayasthala eva viśeṣyānvitaviśeṣaṇasya svātanatryeṇopasthityarthameva lakṣaṇāśrayaṇamiti cenna /
GSP29vytrkt2u:7008: kiṃ caivaṃ nivartakamaniṣṭasādhanatvamapi balavadiṣṭānanubandhitvena viśeṣaṇīyaṃ syāt //
GSP29vytrkt2u:7009: imāmeva pratibandīṃ darśayituṃ viṣṇutatvanirṇaye“nivartate ca viparyayeṇa“ityuktam //
GSP29vytrkt2u:7010: nanu tatra balavadiṣṭānubandhitvajñānaṃ pratibandhakamiti balavadiṣṭānubandhitvājñānameva nivṛttiheturna tu balavadiṣṭānanubandhitvena jñānamapi,
GSP29vytrkt2u:7012: pravṛttihetuḥ na tu balavadaniṣṭānanubandhitvena jñānamapi ananubhavāditi samam // @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:7013: tuṣyatu durjana iti doṣāntaramāha -- kiṃ caivamiti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:7015: tatrāpi vidhisthala iva tāvanmātraṃ na nivartakam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:7017: tathā ca niṣedhavākyasthena na cetyādipūrvoktavirodha iti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt2u:7021: pratibandīkathanasya viśeṣaṇatyāga eva phalamiti paramukhena samādhiṃ vācayitvā samamityāha -- nanviti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:7029: na caivaṃ janakībhūtajñānaṃ vighaṭayata eva pratibandhakatvāttadvighaṭanīyamananubandhitvena 1 jñānaṃ hetuḥ syāditi vācyama /
GSP29vytrkt2u:7033: maṇau pūrvapakṣe kṛtisādhyatvajñānasya hetutve kathitayuktiṃ tulyanyāyatayātrāpyāśaṅkya nirāha -- na caivamiti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:7036: sākṣādavirodhino jñānasya yatkiñcijjanakajñānaṃ vighaṭayata eva kāryapratibandhakatvam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:7038: balavadaniṣṭānubandhitvajñānasya pratibandhakatvānyathānupapatyaiva tadananubandhitvādijñānaṃ kāraṇamityāyātamiti na ca vācyamityarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:7039: sākṣādavirodhino jñānasya yatkiñcijjanakavighaṭakatvenaiva pratibandhakatvopapattau kiṃ janakajñānavighaṭakatveneti jñānaviśeṣaṇeneti bhāvenāha -- pravṛttīti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:7040: astu vā tavāyaṃ niyastathāpi na prakṛte cajjñānasya hetutvamāyāti sākṣādena virodhatvasaṃbhavādityāha -- iṣṭānubandhitveti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:7043: svarūpasadbalavadveṣaviṣayaduḥkhājanakatve sati tādṛśecchāviṣayasādhanamiti jñānaṃ pravartakamiti nirgalitortha iti pakṣadharoktamāśaṅkate -- nanu tarhīti // @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:7050: satyapi tajjanye duḥkhe balavadveṣābhāvena balavadveṣaviṣayaduḥkhājanakatvajñānasya satvāditi cenna /
GSP29vytrkt2u:7051: kasya cidalasāderyāgādyanuṣṭhānajanyaduḥkhepi balavadveṣasya satvena bavadveṣa 2 viṣayaduḥkhānanundhitvena 3 viśiṣṭasya vidhipratyayārthasya bādhitatayā vidhānānupapatteḥ // @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:7056: nanu -- taṃ prati vidhyayoge 'pi puruṣāntaraṃ prati kālāntare taṃ pratyeva vā vidhānopapattiriti cenna /
GSP29vytrkt2u:7060: na ca balavatvamutkaṭatvaṃ tacca jātiviśeṣa iti yuktam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:7061: utkaṭānutkaṭānānāduḥkhaviṣayakasamūhālambanādyatra tadubhayagocarā dveṣa ekāṃśe utkaṭaḥ aparāṃśe anutkaṭaḥ kathaṃ tatra jātiḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:7070: na ca pravartamānasya balavadveṣo vivakṣita iti vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:7071: niṣiddhepi karmaṇyutkaṭarāgeṇa pravartamānasya tajjanyaduḥkhe balavadveṣābhāvena niṣiddhasyāpi vidheyatvāpātāt /
GSP29vytrkt2u:7075: yadi ca tasya tatropādhitvaṃ tarhyananugama eva /
GSP29vytrkt2u:7093: vyabhicārāt śyenādau lakṣaṇāprasaṅgāt nivartake aniṣṭasādhanatvepi viśeṣeṇaprasaṅgācca
GSP29vytrkt2u:7094: iṣṭāsādhanatvaṃ maṇyādyuktarītyā caturdhā na viśeṣaṇīyamiti' ityadhikam -ga.rā.su. @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:7102: tena tavdyākhyānābhimataṃ nanu tarhi balavadityādinoktaṃ cuturthaviśeṣaṇaṃ dhyeyam //
GSP29vytrkt2u:7115: prakṛte ceṣṭasādhanatvasya liṅādinā pratīyamānatvāttadarthakatvakalpanameva tasya yuktamitibhāvenāha -- phalapadeti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:7126: caturthe tṛtīyapāde“codanāyāṃ phalāśruteḥ karmamātraṃ pratīyeta na hyaśabdaṃ pratīyate“iti
GSP29vytrkt2u:7127: pañcamedhikaraṇe viśvajitā yajetetyādi viśvajidādināmakayāgeṣu aśrutaphaleṣu phalamastyuta
GSP29vytrkt2u:7128: neti saṃdehe svargādirūpādṛṣṭaphalasya śabdapramāṇakatvādiha ca svargādibodhakaśabdābhāvāt
GSP29vytrkt2u:7134: tadekaṃ phalamevaṃ 1 rūpamiti viśiṣyānirṇayāt punaḥ sarvārthatvameveti prāpta svargasya
GSP29vytrkt2u:7135: duḥkhāsaṃbhinnasukharūpatayā sarvābhilaṣitatvāt svarge evādhyāhāreṇa kalpya iti
GSP29vytrkt2u:7137: tathā ca tatra bhāvyatayeṣṭasāmānyākāṅkṣāyāṃ satyāmeva svargarūpeṣṭaviśeṣakalpanaṃ yatkṛtaṃ tacca na syādityarthaḥ / @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:7148: nanu tathāpīṣṭasādhanatvaṃ takṣakacūḍāmaṇyāharaṇādāvapravṛtyarthaṃ kṛtisādhyatvenāvaśyaṃ viśeṣaṇīyamiti cenna / @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:7153: takṣakacūḍāmaṇyāharaṇādikaṃ ca takṣakadaṃśana 3 bhītyā kṛtyasādhyamiti bhāvaḥ / @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:7157: tadasādhyatvajñānadaśāyāṃ tu 2 kṛtyā phalaṃ sādhayiṣyāmīti kṛtisādhyatvaprakārikāyāḥ phalecchāyā
GSP29vytrkt2u:7159: na hi sādhane kṛtyasādhyatvena jñāte phale kṛtisādhyatvaṃ jñātuṃ śakyam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:7160: na ca phalasya kṛtisādhyatvājñāne phale tatprakārikecchāyuktā /
GSP29vytrkt2u:7161: kṛtisādhyatvaviśiṣṭeṣṭasādhanatājñānaṃ vā kāryatājñānaṃ vā pravartakamiti mate 'pi hi uktā phalecchā'vaśyakī / @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:7165: sādhanasya kṛtyasādhyatvajñānakāle phalecchāyā abhāva eva kuta iti cet /
GSP29vytrkt2u:7169: astvevaṃ tathāpi phalecchāyā āvaśyakatvameva kuta ityataḥ pratijñāpūrvaṃ hetumāha -- kṛtisādhyatveti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:7179: dṛśyate hi phalaṃ daivādanyakṛtito 'pi vā mama sidhyatvitīcchāyāṃ tvaduktaviśiṣṭeṣṭasādhanatvajñāne
GSP29vytrkt2u:7180: kṛtisādhyatvajñāne ca satyapi phalaṃ kṛtyāsādhayiṣyāmītīcchābhāvena pravṛtyabhāvaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt2u:7181: nanvevaṃ kriyāyāḥ kṛtisādhyatvajñānamapi tvayāpi pravartakatvena svīkṛtamiti cet / satyam / @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:7185: spaṣṭārthaṃ jñānadvaye satītyasya ghaṭanārthaṃ veti dhyeyam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:7198: uktarūpaphalecchāṃ prati hetutvena phale kṛtisādhyatvajñānasyāṅgīkṛtatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:7200: viditābhiprāyaḥ“liṅgādyarthastu iṣṭāsādhanatvameve“ti karmanirṇayavākyaṃ hṛdi kṛtvā pariharati --satyamityādinā //
GSP29vytrkt2u:7201: kena tarhi kṛtisādhyatvajñānaṃ kuto liṅgādijanyaṃ netyata āha -- kriyāyā iti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:7205: kriyāyāḥ kṛtisādhyatvasya kṛtyanvayavyatirekagamyatvena tatra liṅ 1 śakte rakalpanāt /
GSP29vytrkt2u:7206: na hi yajetetiśabdaḥ svargakāmasya yāgaḥ śakya ityāha /
GSP29vytrkt2u:7210: kiṃ ca kṛtisādhyatve satīṣṭasādhanatvaṃ na liṅarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:7213: liṅāradyartha ityucyate tathaiva pratītibalātkṛtisādhyatvamapi liṅgādyartha ityucyatāmityata āha -- nahīti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:7218: evaṃ tarhi sarvepi kuto na pravartante kuto vā sarve 'pi na nivartante ityata āha -- tatra śakta iti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:7223: yadyapi - ekasya pākāderyaṃ prati sādhyatvaṃ taṃ
GSP29vytrkt2u:7225: kāṣṭhādirūpasvakāraṇaṃ prati sādhyatvamodanādi 4 kāryaṃ prati sādhanatvamaviruddham/
GSP29vytrkt2u:7236: asiddhatākāle sādhyatvasya siddhatvadaśāyāṃ sādhanatvasya ca saṃbhavāt /
GSP29vytrkt2u:7241: ādyasya caturthapāde“nāmadheye guṇaśruteḥ syādvidhānamiti cedi“ti pañcame 'dhikaraṇe
GSP29vytrkt2u:7243: saṃśaye 3 yajeteti śrutyā 4 khyātopāttaprayatnāparaparyāyabhāvanayā yāgasya prakṛtipratyasamabhivyāhārabalenakarmatva
GSP29vytrkt2u:7245: peyarūpavājena yāgaṃ kuryādityanvayasya yugapadeva saṃbhavādguṇavidhipara iti prāpte
GSP29vytrkt2u:7248: bodhamupetya phalānvaya eva vācyaḥ vājapeyapadaṃ tu nāmadheyamiti siddhāntitam / @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:7249: 1.tu vi-naṃ.u. 2.tra kiṃ vā-naṃ.u. 3.ye yāya -u. e 4.tyākhyā naṃ.u. 5.sthala catuṣṭaye karaṇa ityevāsti - naṃ. u. e. @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:7251: api ca na kṛtisādhyatvena jñānamātraṃ pravartakam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:7255: kiṃ tvayaṃ yāgo matkṛtisādhyo matkṛtiṃ vināsatvāt ityanumānena 1 /
GSP29vytrkt2u:7258: na ca pravartakajñānajanakasya liṅgasya śabdenopasthāpanācchābdatvamiti vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:7261: ityanumānenaiva sarvasya siddhyā liṅa ākhyātāntaravatkṛtirevārtho na tviṣṭasādhanatvamapītyāpatteḥ //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:7263: kṛtisādhyatveṣṭasādhanatvayorupasthāpakatvāyogāt na viśiṣṭaṃ viṅādividhipratyayārthopi tu tadupasthiteranyataḥ siddhatvānna liṅgādestadarthakatvamityāha -- api ceti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:7266: 1.naiva / evaṃ ca liṅā kṛtisādhye yāge svargasādhanatvenoktemānāntareṇa ca svakṛtacisādhyatve buddhe svargaṃ kṛtyā sādhayiṣyāmīti phalecchāyāṃ ca satyāṃ yāge cikīrṣākṛtī bhavataḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:7275: manmate tu svakṛtisādhyatvajñānaṃ na pravartakamiti nānumānāpekṣā / yāge
GSP29vytrkt2u:7276: svargasādhanatvena jñāte svasyoktāyāṃ svargecchāyāṃ ca satyāṃ pravṛttāvavatilambāt /
GSP29vytrkt2u:7287: “vājapeyena svārājyakāmo yajete“tyādau yaji 1 noktayāgasya uddeśyatvānuvādyatvaprādhānyarūpa dharmatrayaṃ,
GSP29vytrkt2u:7289: parasparaviruddhamuddeśyatvādidharmatrayasya yathākramupādeyatvādidharmatrayapratidvandvitvādviruddhaṃ yatrikadvayaṃ tasya yāge āpātācceti kiṃ cetyādinoktahetvuvādaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:7292: jijñāsādhikaraṇe“kāryatā ca na kācitsyā“dityādiparakīyakāryatākhaṇḍanaprakaraṇe“tadiṣṭaṃ sādhanaṃ tathā“ityupasaṃhāravākyavyākhyāvasare sudhāyāmuktamityarthaḥ
GSP29vytrkt2u:7299: kṛtisādhyeṣṭasādhanatāyāḥ kāryatā 1 paryāyatvāditi niṣṇutatvanirṇayaṭīkāyā ca saha virodha iti vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:7302: ata eva karmanirṇaye liṅādyarthastviṣṭasādhanatvameveti liṅādesttviṣṭasādhanatārthatvenaiva kṛtārthatvamiti coktam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:7306: na ca siddher'thache vākyasya prāmāṇyābhāvādityādiprakaraṇena 2 cārthāpattiḥ anupapattyabhāvādityetavdyākhyānarūpayetyarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:7325: kṛtisādhyatvasya liṅādyarthatvābhāvena tajjñānajanakasya kasya cidapi śabdasyābhāvādeva
GSP29vytrkt2u:7332: liṅādinā pravṛttikāraṇamiṣṭasādhanatājñānameva jāyate na tu kṛtisādhyatājñānapītyetadapītyarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:7335: liṅādiśabdādiṣṭasādhanatāmeva jñātvā pravartata iti tatvanirṇayavākyārtha iti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt2u:7336: etena -- karmanirṇayaṭīkāyāṃ kṛtisādhyatvaṃ pravartakajñānakoṭau na praveśitam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:7337: tatvanirṇayaṭīkāyāṃ tu pravartakajñānaviṣayatābhimatakāryatākoṭau kṛtisādhyatvasya praveśāttasyāpi pravartakajñānaviṣayakauṭau praveśaḥ kṛtaḥ
GSP29vytrkt2u:7342: yadvā śabdajanyamiṣṭasādhanatvajñānameva pravartakaṃ mānāntarajanyaṃ yāgādeḥ kṛtisādhyatvajñānaṃ
GSP29vytrkt2u:7343: tu phalaṃ kṛtyā sādhayiṣyāmīti kṛtisādhyatvaprakārikā yāvaśyakī phalecchā tadutpādanopakṣīṇam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:7345: tathā ca sudhā kṛtisādhyatvajñānasya sākṣādupayoganiṣedhikā nirṇayaṭīke tu paraṃparopayogapare itina virodhaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt2u:7347: takṣakacaḍūmaṇyāharaṇādau tu mānāntarajanyaṃ kṛtyasādhyatvajñānaṃ pratibandhakamiti kṛtisādhyatvajñānaṃ pratabandhakanirāsāpekṣaṇim / @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:7350: adhunā kṛtisādhyatvajñānasya sākṣātpravṛttihetutvaṃ na kvāpyabhimatamityupetya virodhaṃ prakārāntareṇa nirāha -- yadveti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:7358: kṛtisādhyatvajñānasya vā kṛtisādhyatvaprakārakaphalecchāya vā vidhaṭaneneti vācyamiti
GSP29vytrkt2u:7365: nirṇayaṭīke tu upayogamātrāstitvapare iti na virodha ityāhuḥ//
GSP29vytrkt2u:7368: sā ca sādhanaviṣayaka 1 kṛtiṃ prati kiñcidantaritāṣa'pi svavirodhivyāpārānantaritā pravṛttiheturiti tvayāpi svīkāryam //
GSP29vytrkt2u:7370: nanu -- yaduktaṃ prākphalecchāyāṃ sādhane cikārṣākṛtī bhavata iti,
GSP29vytrkt2u:7372: sādhanacikīrṣayā vyavahitā satī phaleccha kathaṃ sādhanagocarakṛtiṃ pratihetuḥ syādityāśaṅkāṃ
GSP29vytrkt2u:7373: pariharan ṭīkādyavirodhokterupayogaṃ ca vivakṣuḥ pravṛttihetuṃ viṣkṛṣya darśayati -- tasmāditi //
GSP29vytrkt2u:7382: -- jñāte rāgadveṣau tu svarūpasantau hetū bālasyādyapravṛttāviṣṭasādhanatājñānaṃ tu jīvanādṛṣṭabalena janmāntarīyasaṃskārāditi sarvaṃ sustham
